title: Part Time VA For AI Projects
description:
We’re looking for a proactive, tech-savvy Virtual Assistant to support our digital marketing and automation efforts. This role is ideal for someone who’s curious, adaptable, and excited to grow alongside fast-evolving AI and marketing platforms.  This is an opportunity to learn and get paid at the same time, while building your experience and skill sets. 



**Key Responsibilities**



* Assist with digital marketing initiatives across Instagram, TikTok, and online platforms

* Create and support content using AI writing and content creation tools

* Implement & connect workflows for
 autoresponders & funnels.

* Work with AI SMS and AI Receptionist services for marketing and client engagement

* Manage and support campaigns within Go High Level CRM

* Support affiliate marketing and/or local marketing efforts

* Research, test, and implement new tools and workflows as needed



**Required Skills & Experience**



* Background in digital marketing (social, local, or affiliate marketing preferred)

* Familiarity with AI platforms for content creation and writing & willingness to learn

* Awareness or hands-on experience with AI SMS and AI receptionist tools & automation.

* Experience using internet platforms such as Go High Level CRM, Instagram, and TikTok

* Strong communication skills and fluent English and attention to detail



**What We’re Really Looking For**



* A strong willingness to learn, adapt, and grow

* Curiosity about new tools, AI platforms, and marketing strategies

* A positive, self-driven attitude and long-term mindset



**Why This Role**

You’ll gain hands-on access to a wide variety of marketing and AI tools, platforms, and systems—giving you real opportunities to expand your skillset, stay ahead of trends, and grow professionally.

title: Geotechnical Engineer
description:
We are an Australian-based professional services business seeking a reliable, long-term Geotechnical Engineer based in the Philippines to support our growing geotechnical team. This is a remote role offering ongoing work and close collaboration with Australian project engineers.



Role Overview:

The Geotechnical Engineer will primarily support the team through geotechnical assessments, technical report preparation, and design support for Australian projects. The role suits someone with strong technical fundamentals, excellent reporting skills, and familiarity (or willingness to learn) Australian Standards.



Key Responsibilities

1. Geotechnical Assessment & Reporting

Prepare high-quality geotechnical engineering reports, including:

Site investigation findings

Engineering analysis

Clear, practical recommendations

Review and interpret field and laboratory test data

Assist with geotechnical assessment of soil and rock conditions



Provide engineering input for:

Foundation design

Earthworks and site preparation

Excavations and ground support

Pavement and subgrade assessments

Ensure reports comply with relevant Australian Standards and project specifications

Collaborate remotely with Australian-based engineers and stakeholders

Support ongoing geotechnical tasks as directed by the project lead



2. Geotechnical Assessment & Design Support



Review and interpret geotechnical investigation data

Assess soil and rock conditions for proposed developments

Provide engineering recommendations for:

Foundation systems

Earthworks and site preparation

Pavement subgrade conditions

Excavation and ground support requirements



About You

Degree in Geotechnical Engineering, Civil Engineering, or related discipline

Experience in geotechnical reporting and interpretation of investigation data

Strong written English skills, particularly for technical reports

Familiarity with Australian Standards is highly regarded (training can be provided)

Detail-oriented, reliable, and comfortable working remotely

Looking for a long-term role with a stable Australian business



What We Offer

Long-term, ongoing remote work

Exposure to Australian engineering projects and standards

Supportive team environment with clear guidance

Competitive compensation based on experience

title: AirBNB Guest Relations Manager. MUST have 3+ Years AirBNB PM experience
description:
MUST HAVE 3 Years MINIMUM AIRBNB MANAGEMENT EXPERIENCE



-VERY detailed in appointment setting, payroll calculations, guest communication

-Fluent Written and Spoken English and VERY good critical thinking/judgement in handling delicate situations

-3+ Years of AirBNB experience (Guest Relations/ Property Management)

-Experience with Guesty, Slack, Clickup, Pricelabs and/or Stripe a PLUS

-FAST learner who can add value by thinking outside the box to solve hard problems.



NOW OFFERING faster-than-average promotion cycle and compensation increase for our most outstanding performers!! Come join a fast-growing AirBNB property management and investment company!  We are looking for Long-Term, Full-Time employees to grow with us.  We are based out of Gatlinburg, TN and are currently a team of 3 VA's (have been working with me 2 years now) + Handymen/Cleaners.  



LOOKING FOR EXCEPTIONAL CANDIDATES TO GROW WITH OUR TEAM!  We are like a family and I have the tea
et once per quarter to hang out with each other, go to the pool, enjoy.  I care about my team and feel like my team is almost my family.  We are all super friendly, hard-working, and looking for our next SUPERSTAR to help grow our business!  



Job Details:

You will be a Guest Relations Assistant and will be in charge of facilitating smooth check ins/outs, coordinating the cleaning staff, dealing with guest inquiries, requests, complaints, and keeping track of reviews.  You will help populate internal databases and contribute to the ongoing learning of the team by documenting your learnings diligently and assisting in the training of new assistants.



Most important skills:

1) Excellent written, spoken English and able to understand American specific phrases and behaviors

2) EXPERT in AirBNB, Homeaway, 
...

3) VERY HIGH attention to detail and NEVER letting things "fall through the cracks" (Never forgetting when something needs to be done/ HIGHLY accountable for your job to make sure its done fast and right)

4) Good judgement, ultra-professional demeanor, and desire to ensure the guest has a great experience

5) Fast learning curve and a go-getter, always-improving mentality

6) Extremely high organizational skills.   

7) Ability to learn new software and integrate it into your workflow.



Some daily tasks:

1) Handling guest communication and dealing with guest complaints

2) Maintaining the airbnb, homeaway, and 
 listings and calendars to ensure the calendars are accurate, and we are maximizing our bookings.

3) Communicate effectively with our staff and manage and arrange for cleanings/ repairs/ maintenance.

4) Following up aggressively to make sure tasks are being completed (a guest is asking for a toaster and they can't find it!  What do you do?)  hint: ask the housekeeper where it is first; then have them check again; then allow them to purchase one)

5) You get the idea... it's a high-touch, guest relations role where you also help think about how to improve the business.  



If this is of interest, please do let me know so we can set up an interview.  Please send me an updated resume for my review.  



Are you looking for a position working as an AirBNB Virtual Guest Relations Assistant?  The job will be 40 hours/ week with 2 days off.   It's with a an exciting, fast-growing Real Estate Investment company in the Hospitality space.  Our specialty is providing high-touch, excellent guest service at a reasonable cost and empowering our staff to make critical business judgments.   With us, you will truly learn the Hotel/AirBNB business, and is a great start to a career with a fast-growing, fun real estate startup.   Pay will be commensurate with experience and performance on the interview process.  We have occasional parties and trips for the  VA's on to bond and facilitate team-building.We may be looking into getting an office space for our team outside Manila or in Clark/Pampanga.



GENEROUS SALARY AND PERFORMANCE BONUSES for the exceptional candidate! 



THANKS FOR YOUR INTEREST!!!





Noah Mencia

CEO of Plethora Capital, Inc.

title: Customer Service Representative - Clear English Speaker
description:
Job Title: Customer Service Representative

Location: Remote



Summary: We need a very confident and clear English speaker with minimal accent. You must have Customer Service phone and
 experience.



Company Overview:



Join a dynamic and growing telemedicine company specializing in innovative healthcare solutions. The company is dedicated to providing accessible and affordable healthcare to patients through a seamless online experience. As a Customer Service Representative, you will be an essential part of ensuring that customers receive the best possible support and care.



Job Description:



Key Responsibilities:



- Respond to customer inquiries via
 promptly and professionally.

- Handle inbound and outbound calls, providing support and resolving issues related to product orders, account management, and general inquiries.

- Communicate fluently in English, offering support to customers in a clear and empathetic manner. Spanish fluency is a plus.

- Escalate complex issues to appropriate tea
mbers while maintaining clear and empathetic communication with the customer.

- Maintain a deep understanding of the company’s products, services, and policies to provide accurate information to customers.

- Document and track customer interactions and issues, ensuring accurate records are kept.

- Contribute to team efforts by accomplishing related tasks as needed.

title: Senior Graphic Designer with Modern Skill with AI Prompting Master Skils and proven experience with Amazon
description:
ABOUT US



Since 2013, Prodigy Media has built more than brands — we've created an Amazon-native empire. With 12 years of proven success and 28+ product lines under our belt, we don't play small. Our mission? Launch culturally resonant, design-led, emotionally sticky products that dominate Amazon and beyond.



Now, we're leveling up — and we want a design assassin who’s mastered AI workflows, commands Midjourney like a wizard, and turns prompts into visual gold.



WHO WE WANT



This is not your average graphic design role. We're looking for a hybrid Creative Director / Prompt Engineer / Graphic Design savant who can:



Think like a marketer. Design like an artist. Prompt like an AI god.



You’ll own the visual storytelling for our brands, using both traditional tools and bleeding-edge AI systems to pump out Amazon-optimized assets that convert.



WHAT YOU’LL DO



Craft Ultra-High-Converting Amazon Ads – static, lifestyle, 
-tier, and scroll-stopping. Own A+ Content Design – full module execution with story arcs that build obsession. Design Labels & Packaging – pixel-perfect, regulatory-ready, and unforgettable on the shelf. Prompt, Edit & Produce AI-Generated Visuals – using tools like Midjourney, DALL•E, Runway, Spline, Veo3, Sora, and others. Run 3D Product Renders – via Blender, KeyShot, or AI-powered 3D tools. Develop Scroll-Hook Videos – using After Effects, Premiere, Runway AI, etc.



Systematize Brand Visuals Across 30+ Products – while keeping it all aligned, emotional, and conversion-focused.



WHO YOU ARE



5+ years in design, at least 2+ years in Amazon/e-commerce brand creative

Fluent in Adobe Creative Suite, Figma, Blender, After Effects

Pro-level Midjourney / AI prompt engineer – this is non-negotiable

Obsessed with Amazon visual psychology, packaging psychology, and design that sells

Able to juggle 10 brands and still hit deadlines

Operate with a Creative Director mindset — not just execution, but strategy

Bonus: Experience creating creative systems, art direction templates, or leading a team



MUST-HAVES

Portfolio with Amazon ads, A+ pages, labels, 3D renders, videos, and AI-gen examples

Real-world use of AI tools integrated into your workflow

Available Mon-Fri 5:00am–2:00pm PST

title: Strategic Growth Coordinator
description:

Salary: $2,100 USD per month

Schedule: Monday through Friday, 8 AM to 5 PM CT

Location: Remote



Role Overview:



We are seeking a highly organized, proactive Strategic Growth Coordinator to support one Strategic Growth pod at a fast paced U.S. marketing agency. This is an execution heavy coordination role for someone who takes initiative, anticipates needs, and keeps work moving without being asked.



You will support two to three senior leaders within a pod and act as the operational backbone of their day to day work. Your job is to manage recurring workflows, track follow through, coordinate across teams, and remove friction so leadership can stay focused on strategy.



This is an internal facing role. No sales. Limited client exposure initially. High trust, high responsibility.



Responsibilities:

- Manage budget lock processes and related tracking inside internal systems

- Create tasks fro
etings, assign owners, and follow up until completion

- Track action items and proactively remind leaders before deadlines

- Draft, proof, and clean PowerPoint decks and internal documents

- Support competitive research and industry updates as needed

- Flag issues, inconsistencies, or risks early and clearly

- Adapt quickly to shifting priorities and urgent requests

Success Indicators:



- Leaders feel operationally supported and unblocked

- No dropped tasks or missed follow ups

- Strong trust built with pod leaders



Work Requirements:

title: Operations Assistant
description:
Operations Assistant (Outsourced / Remote)

Reporting to: Chief Operating Officer

 Location: Remote (Offshore)

 Engagement: Full-time / Long-term Contract

 Industry: Digital Assets / Hedge Fund / Financial Services



Role Overview

This is a high-trust, high-autonomy operations role supporting the COO across the execution of day-to-day business operations. The Operations Assistant acts as an extension of the COO — taking loosely defined problems, determining what needs to be done, and driving them to completion with minimal supervision. This is not a task-taking role. It is an ownership role. You will be expected to operate independently, manage ambiguity, and close operational loops without constant direction.



Core Responsibilities

Operational Execution & Ownership



Take ownership of operational tasks delegated by the COO and execute them end-to-end. Translate high-level or loosely defined requests into clear actions. Anticipate dependencies, blockers, and follow-ups without being prompted.

Close loops and confirm completion rather than leaving tasks half-done.



Accounts, Counterparties & Exchanges

Open and manage accounts with exchanges, custodians, banks, brokers, and service providers. Coordinate onboarding documentation, KYC, KYB, and account setup. Track onboarding status, outstanding items, access credentials, and approvals.

Maintain a clear inventory of active counterparties and access points.



KYC & Compliance Operations

Track KYC refresh requirements across exchanges, counterparties, and vendors. Proactively manage document updates, renewals, and submissions. Maintain structured, up-to-date repositories of corporate and personal KYC materials.

Ensure KYC records are complete, consistent, and audit-ready.



Board & Governance Operations

Support post-board and committee meeting execution and follow-through. Maintain a centralized board action log covering actions, owners, deadlines, and status. Chase internal and external stakeholders for overdue actions where appropriate.

Prepare clean post-meeting summaries highlighting open actions and next steps. Ensure board materials, minutes, resolutions, and action trackers are correctly filed, versioned, and accessible. Keep governance records organized and inspection-ready.



Investor & External Requests (Light Touch)

Support responses to routine investor or counterparty queries. Gather data, documents, and supporting materials as requested. Escalate matters requiring judgment, decisions, or approvals.



Data, Documentation & Systems Hygiene

Organize, clean, and maintain Google Drive and internal document repositories. Digitize and streamline operational documentation  Enforce consistent naming, version control, and folder structures. Ensure critical documents are easy to locate and clearly labeled.



Process Improvement & Automation

Identify inefficient, manual, or repetitive operational processes. Propose and implement improvements using automation or workflow tools where appropriate. Create simple SOPs, checklists, or trackers once processes stabilize.

Improve operational clarity and reduce dependency on ad-hoc explanations.



Ad-hoc COO Support

Pull data, prepare summaries, and assist with operational analysis. Support one-off operational projects as they arise.

Handle frequent context switching without losing accuracy or follow-through. 



Required Experience & Skills

3+ years in operations, administration, or execution-focused roles. Experience working in fast-moving, loosely structured environments. Comfortable interacting with financial institutions, exchanges, and service providers.

Strong written English and clear, concise communication. Highly organized with strong attention to detail.

Confident using tools such as Google Drive, spreadsheets, and workflow tools. Able to work independently and manage competing priorities.



Strongly Preferred

Experience in hedge funds, crypto, fintech, or financial services. Prior remote or offshore role supporting senior management. Familiarity with KYC / KYB processes. Experience maintaining governance or compliance documentation.

title: Accountant / Bookkeeper
description:
Accountant / Bookkeeper

Location: Remote / Offshore

Reporting to: COO, CFO

Industry: Crypto Hedge Fund / Technology Investments



Role Overview

We are hiring a hands-on Accountant / Bookkeeping professional to own day-to-day bookkeeping and support core fund accounting and NAV reconciliation processes across a multi-entity, multi-currency group.

This is not a clerical or data-entry role. You will be responsible for maintaining clean, auditable books, supporting monthly closes, and contributing directly to hedge fund NAV reconciliations alongside internal stakeholders and external fund administrators.

The ideal candidate has executed a migration to Xero, is comfortable working with imperfect legacy data, and can operate independently in a regulated, detail-sensitive environment.



Core Accounting Responsibilities

Own bookkeeping across multiple entities from transaction level through monthly close





Perform bank, credit card, and expense reconciliations with no unreconciled balances carried forward





Maintain general ledger, journals, accruals, and supporting schedules





Prepare monthly P&L, balance sheet, and management reporting packs





Manage multi-currency transactions, FX revaluations, and intercompany expenses





Track operational costs, vendor payments, and recurring obligations





Prepare clean, well-supported financial records for external accountants, auditors, and tax advisors







Xero & Systems Responsibilities

Execute or lead migration from an existing accounting platform to Xero





Map and restructure chart of accounts where required





Migrate historical data and opening balances





Validate post-migration data integrity through full reconciliation





Ensure Xero is maintained in a clean, audit-ready state post go-live



Fund & NAV Support Responsibilities

Support monthly hedge fund NAV processes in coordination with fund administrators





Reconcile cash, expenses, fees, and internal records to administrator NAV reports





Assist in identifying, investigating, and resolving NAV breaks





Maintain working papers supporting management fees, performance fees, and expense allocations





Prepare clear, defensible schedules to support internal review and NAV sign-off



Required Experience & Skills

3–5+ years of hands-on bookkeeping or accounting experience





Direct responsibility for migrating an accounting system to Xero, including data migration and reconciliation





Experience working in multi-entity and multi-currency environments





Exposure to fund accounting or hedge fund NAV processes, either in-house or alongside a fund administrator





Strong understanding of core accounting principles and controls





High attention to detail with strong reconciliation discipline





Able to work independently, prioritise effectively, and meet recurring reporting deadlines





Clear, professional English communication skills



Nice to Have

Experience in hedge funds, investment firms, fintech, or technology companies





Exposure to crypto-related accounting environments (wallets, custodians, fiat on/off-ramps; non-trading)





Experience working with offshore or internationally distributed teams



Not a Fit If

Your experience is limited to basic bookkeeping without ownership of close or reconciliations





You have not worked with multi-entity or multi-currency structures





You have never supported fund accounting or NAV-related processes

title: Telemarketers/Cold Callers
description:
Your skills and time are needed by my company to help me reach potential clients at an affordable rate.



Please let me know if you are available to work 4-8-12 hour shifts from Monday - Friday



When hospices do not have nurses available to take care of their dying patient's they call companies like mine to ask us to send nurses 24 hours a day for a few days while their patient's are dying. We then send nurses for 8 hour shifts to the patient's and the nurses alternate so that we can provide the hospice patients with 24 hours of continuous care for the few days at the end of a patient's life.



The right candidate will be able to cold call Hospices in Southern California (United States) from a list of hospices I have, and attempt to get them to sign a contract so that my company can provide them with nursing services.

Jared Larner, LVN; CEO & Founder

title: Retail & Distributor Outreach Assistant (Part-Time, Contractor) plus commissions & bonuses
description:
About the Role



I’m the founder of a growing natural, vegan skincare and sunscreen brand based in the UK. I’m looking for a reliable, detail-oriented assistant to help manage outreach to retail stockists and distributors.



This role is suited to someone with sales or lead-generation experience who understands wholesale ecosystems and can confidently distinguish between brands, retailers/stockists, distributors, and competitors.



You’ll be responsible for keeping a high-quality outreach pipeline active and organised. I will handle closing and final negotiations.



Hours & Schedule



- Independent contractor role (hourly)



- Part-time: 12 hours per week



- Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday



- 4 hours per day



- Some overlap with UK business hours required



- Start date: ASAP



- Long-term role for the right person





Key Responsibilities



Outreach & Follow-Ups



- Send outreach
s to appropriate retail stockists and distributors



- Personalise
s thoughtfully (not mass outreach)



- Adapt and improve outreach templates over time



- Manage follow-ups and track responses clearly





Lead sourcing & tracking



- Track every account in a simple pipeline tracker or spreadsheet



- Correctly classify leads as:

   

        - Company-Sourced (we provide the target company; you find contacts and manage follow-up)

        - Assistant-Sourced (you independently identify a suitable retail stockist or distributor)



- Use judgement to flag borderline, strategic, or unsuitable accounts before outreach



- Confirm sourcing status in the tracker if unclear before spending time on it





Sales Cycle & Pipeline Support



- Support the sales process from prospecting to warm lead handover



- Qualify retailers and distributors based on brand fit



- Maintain clear notes on outreach status and next steps





Research & Prospecting



- Research and identify genuine multi-brand retail stockists and aligned distributors



- Identify correct buyers, founders, or category contacts



- Build and maintain a curated outreach list (quality over volume)





Communication & Reporting



- Clearly summarise replies and actions required



- Flag interested or time-sensitive leads promptly



- Maintain an organised spreadsheet or CRM





Requirements



- Experience in wholesale sales, B2B outreach, account management, or lead generation



- Clear understanding of the difference between:



            - brands vs retailers/stockists

            - competitors vs wholesale accounts

            - boutiques vs large chains



- Understanding of the sales cycle and follow-up process



- Strong written English



- Excellent organisation and attention to detail



- Confident researching companies and decision-makers



- Comfortable using Google Sheets and/or CRMs (PipeDrive a plus)



- LinkedIn outreach experience preferred





What This Role Is Not



- No cold calling



- No closing or negotiation



- No aggressive sales tactics





Tools



-  Gmail



- Google Sheets or CRM (PipeDrive)



- Templates, training, and brand materials provided



- Hubstaff used for time tracking (not micromanagement)





Pay



- PHP 250/hour, paid monthly



- Commission applies to the first paid order only from Assistant-Sourced accounts



- One-off bonuses apply to Company-Sourced accounts



- Commission/bonuses paid after cleared payment is received



(At 12 hours/week, approx. PHP 12,900/month + bonuses.)



How to Apply



 
 with ref SO26 and include:



- A short summary of your experience with sales, outreach, or wholesale support



- How you track outreach and follow-ups



- A short sample outreach
 introducing a natural skincare brand to a retail stockist



-A 1–2 minute Loom video explaining why you’re interested in this specific role and Baie Botanique



NB: Applications without a Loom link will not be reviewed.

title: Creative Strategist (DTC Performance Creative)
description:
Type: Full-time or Part-time (contract-to-hire OK)



Works with: Founder, Media Buyer, Video Editor, Designer



Primary channels: Meta 
/Instagram) + landing page / advertorial funnel



What you’ll own

- You’ll own end-to-end creative strategy for paid social: customer research ? messaging angles ? creative briefs ? AI statics production ? iteration based on performance.



Responsibilities



Market + customer research

- Research competitors, offers, funnels, and creative patterns

- Build customer avatar docs (pain points, desired outcomes, objections, language)

- Extract “winning hooks” and angles from ads, reviews, Reddit, comments, etc.



Creative ideation + direction

- Generate weekly/monthly creative roadmap (themes, angles, concepts)

- Write clear briefs for static + video (hook, structure, scenes, b-roll, overlays, CTA)

- Develop testing matrices (angle x hook x format x offer)



Copywriting

- Draft / improve landing page copy, advertorial copy, and quiz copy

- Write short-form ad copy (primary text, headlines, descriptions) and script outlines



Creative production (AI statics)

- Generate static concepts using AI tools (Midjourney / Nano Banana / OpenAI image, etc.)

- Ensure brand consistency (palette, font style, layout discipline)

- Deliver ready-to-launch assets to the editor/designer



Collaboration

- Work daily/weekly with the video editor and designer to execute briefs fast

- Provide clear feedback based on performance and brand guidelines



Performance iteration

- Review results (thumbstop/CTR/CPC/CPA/CVR) and propose next tests

- Kill/scale creative based on data and learning, not opinions





What “good” looks like in 30 days

- You deliver a clear creative testing plan and run weekly cycles

- You ship consistent briefs and assets without hand-holding

- Creative velocity increases (more variants, better structure, faster iteration)



Requirements

- Proven performance creative experience for DTC (Meta is a must)

- Strong copy instincts (hooks, objections, offers, landing pages)

- Ability to produce AI statics (or willingness to learn fast)

- Organized: can run creative testing like a system

- Comfortable working async with clear deliverables



Nice to have

- Experience with quiz funnels + advertorial funnels

- Direct-response editing instincts (UGC pacing, pattern interrupts)

- Understanding of compliance in sensitive categories (if applicable)



Deliverables you’ll produce

- Weekly creative plan + angle library

- 10–30 static variants/week (depending on scope)

- 5–15 video briefs/week

- Landing page + advertorial + quiz copy drafts/iterations

title: Opera Teacher / Vocal Coach
description:
Hi! My name is Joseph, and I'd like to learn to be a better singer, for karaoke and to sing better at Church.



I'm looking for a person (preferably male baritone) who can video call me and teach me to sing. Looking ideally for someone with good experience in Classical vocal techniques, specifically to help my baritone voice be able to properly reach tenor notes with a well-supported mixed voice.



I already have plenty of vocal warmups and exercises. What I’m looking for is someone who can immediately identify what’s happening physically and acoustically when I sing, especially with:



Soft palate position



Resonance placement



Throat / laryngeal tension



Vowel modification



Chest ? mix ? head coordination



Please upload a video of yourself singing. Thank you

title: Virtual Assistant (Kenya Based) – Research, Execution & Product Launch Support
description:
Location: Kenya (Remote)

Hours: Part time (20 hours/week to start)

Compensation: $6–$8/hour during trial period (with growth potential)

Start: Immediate

________________________________________



About the Role

I’m building a small but serious digital product (Micro SaaS / Chrome Extension) using a detailed execution blueprint. I’m looking for a sharp, reliable, Kenya based virtual assistant to help implement this plan step by step.

This is not a generic VA role. You will be working closely with me to research, organize, test, document, and execute real tasks that move a product toward launch.

You do not need prior SaaS or coding experience. You do need to be intelligent, detail oriented, and eager to learn.

________________________________________



What You’ll Be Doing

• Conducting structured online research

• Analyzing competitors and summarizing findings

• Organizing information into clear documents

• Following step by step instructions precisely

• Drafting simple written content (descriptions, summaries, checklists)

• Testing tools and reporting issues clearly

• Managing task lists and execution checklists

• Using AI tools (ChatGPT, etc.) to assist with research and drafting

• Communicating progress clearly and consistently

________________________________________



What This Role Is Not

• Not customer support

• Not social media posting

• Not cold calling

• Not agency work

• Not a “do whatever you want” role

This is structured execution, not guessing.

________________________________________



Who This Role Is Perfect For

• You are based in Kenya

• You write clear, professional English

• You enjoy learning new systems

• You follow instructions carefully

• You ask smart questions when something is unclear

• You take pride in doing things correctly

• You want a long term working relationship, not quick gigs

________________________________________



Who Should Not Apply

• Agencies or teams

• People juggling many clients

• Anyone who dislikes structure

• Anyone looking for passive income

• Anyone unwilling to learn new tools

________________________________________



Compensation & Growth

• Trial period: $6–$8/hour (20 hours/week)

• Paid weekly

• Raises based on performance, reliability, and initiative

• Long term opportunity for increased responsibility and pay

________________________________________



How to Apply (Important)

To apply, please send:

3. Your internet reliability (briefly)

Applications that do not follow these instructions will not be considered.

________________________________________



Final Note

I value clarity, honesty, and execution. If you do good work, communicate well, and take ownership of tasks, this role can grow with you.

title: Client Coach (Giving Feedback): $1,100 USD START RATE
description:
Start rate: $935 a month + performance-based bonuses (TOTAL: $1,100 a month)



Paid twice per month via Wise.



ABOUT US







Young Publisher is an international digital marketing company working with content creators and online brands.



BENEFITS



- Full-time position: 8 hours daily, Monday-Friday; 40 hours a week

- Flexible schedule: Choose your own hours, as long as you show up for the daily meeting (MANDATORY)

- Stable income: Long-term role with regular, on-time payments

- Supportive team: Collaborative environment without micromanagement

- Growth path: Opportunities to increase responsibilities and earnings

- 100% remote: Work-from-home setup



TASKS



Client Support (maintaining 40-50 total clients):



- Run kickoff calls with new clients using our proven script

- Review client content and give actionable feedback

- Answer client messages within 24 hours

- Host weekly group calls and 1-on-1 coaching sessions

- Help clients overcome content blocks and limiting beliefs



Progress Tracking:



- Update daily/weekly reports

- Track client progress and next steps

- Join daily team check-ins

- Ensure clients follow strategies consistently



REQUIREMENTS (MUST-HAVE)



- C1+ English (written and spoken) with no accent

- Strong communication skills

- Organized and detail-oriented

- Reliable internet and a quiet workspace

- Accountability mindset and deadline commitment



IMPORTANT



When recording a Loom video as part of your application:



- Camera must show your FACE & SCREEN

- Treat it as a LIVE interview with the Hiring Manager

- Have a professional background

- Have clear audio

- Wear business-casual attire



BONUS SKILLS (NOT REQUIRED)



- Content creation and social media experience

- Knowledge of Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube Shorts

- Regular usage of AI tools (ChatGPT, CapCut)



WHY JOIN US?



- Start rate: $935 a month + performance-based bonuses (TOTAL: $1,100 a month)

Note: More experienced CSMs earn between $1,800 and $2,500 after 6-12 months.

- Performance bonuses: Up to $900+ additional monthly based on:

- Client retention rates

- Task completion metrics

- Quality of feedback

- Team collaboration

- Payments: Twice per month via Wise directly to your bank

- Tools access: We'll cover all the needed tools

- Work-life balance: No graveyard shifts

- Professional growth: Regular feedback and skill development



HOW TO APPLY



1: Message us on OnlineJobs.ph with "CSM" as the message title



2: Include ONLY the following in your message:



#1: Your CV.

#2: Your years of experience with short-form content.

#3: Your years of experience with client management.

#4: One sentence on why you're a good fit for this role.

#5: Your portfolio.



Note: Messages that do not follow this format will NOT be reviewed.

title: CONTENT RESEARCH EXPERT (CRE): $800 a month
description:
BENEFITS



- Full-time position: 7.5 hours/day

- Schedule: Monday to Friday, flexible time

- Salary: $800 a month

- Bi-monthly payments via Wise (direct to your bank account, almost no fees, no waiting for payday!)

- A young, supportive team that values your output without micromanagement

- Clear growth path with opportunities to expand your role

- Work with the latest AI tools and social media platforms



TASKS

- Strategically select content ideas that will help specific clients go viral

- Think strategically about what will help each client succeed

- Maintain a content library categorized by niche for efficient future use

- Complete daily End-of-Day Reports (EOD)

- Attend multiple meetings with your manager each week

- Continuously improve content recommendations based on what works



REQUIREMENTS



- Excellent English skills (C1 or above - non-negotiable!)

- Previous experience in content creation is a MUST

- Experience in content research and trend analysis

- Strong understanding of what makes content go viral

- Knowledge of Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube Shorts features

- Strategic thinking and attention to detail

- Ability to provide clear, actionable instructions

- Reliable internet connection and professional home office setup

- 100% say-do ratio and commitment to deadlines



HOW TO APPLY



ROUND 1: Complete our application form and record a personal introduction:



Fill out the form: 
/to/QRoz4WLV



Note: Put "CRE" + [Your Name & Family Name] in the "Name" field in the form.



Record a 3-minute Loom video introducing yourself (instructions in form)



Important: Please provide genuine, personal responses (no AI-written answers). We want to get to know YOU!



ROUND 2: Qualified candidates will be invited for an interview.



MORE ABOUT US



We've been in the industry since 2019 and have worked with over 3000 clients. We currently receive around 80-100 new clients per month. We provide an "80% done-for-you content & monetization system" that helps creators go viral and turn views into income using short-form content, AI, and proven strategies.



MORE ABOUT US

title: Amazon Affiliate Website Manager
description:
Position Description

Job Title: Amazon Affiliate Website Manager

Company: Logic Minds 

Location: Remote – Philippines (Work from Home)

Employment Type: Full-Time

Remuneration: Negotiable

________________________________________

Position Overview

We are seeking a motivated and detail-oriented Amazon Affiliate Website Manager to set up, manage, and grow multiple affiliate websites. The role involves end-to-end responsibility for website development, SEO optimisation, content strategy, traffic acquisition, and affiliate revenue growth. The successful candidate will be proactive, data-driven, and capable of working independently while delivering measurable results.

YOU MUST HAVE EXPERIENCE with AMAZON AFFILIATE WEBSITES to be considered.

We will not respond if you have no experience.

You will need to work Melbourne, Australian hours. 8.30am - 5.30pm

________________________________________

Key Responsibilities

• Website Setup & Management

o Build, configure, and maintain WordPress (or equivalent CMS) websites for Amazon affiliate programs.

o Ensure fast, secure, and mobile-friendly site performance.

o Implement structured product comparison tables, review layouts, and affiliate link tracking.



• Content Strategy & Creation

o Develop content plans for product reviews, buying guides, and blogs targeting profitable niches.

o Coordinate with writers/designers (in-house or freelance) to ensure SEO-friendly, high-quality content.

o Upload, format, and optimise content for readability and conversion.



• Affiliate Program Management

o Manage Amazon Associates accounts, ensuring compliance with Amazon’s policies.

o Insert, track, and optimise affiliate links and product promotions.

o Monitor affiliate dashboards and report on earnings, trends, and conversion rates.



• SEO & Digital Marketing

o Conduct keyword research and competitor analysis to drive targeted traffic.

o Optimise on-page SEO (titles, meta tags, alt text, schema, internal linking).

o Build backlinks and implement off-page SEO strategies.

o Track site analytics (Google Analytics, Search Console) and adjust strategy.



• Performance & Reporting

o Provide weekly/monthly performance reports (traffic, rankings, conversions, earnings).

o Continuously test strategies to improve CTR and conversion rates.

o Recommend new niches and growth opportunities.

________________________________________



Key Skills & Requirements

• Strong knowledge of Amazon Affiliate / Associates Program.

• Hands-on experience with WordPress, Elementor, WooCommerce (or similar platforms).

• Proficiency in SEO best practices, Google Analytics, Search Console, and keyword tools (Ahrefs, SEMrush, Ubersuggest, etc.).

• Familiarity with affiliate link management plugins (ThirstyAffiliates, Lasso, etc.).

• Ability to create and implement content marketing strategies.

• Strong research, analytical, and reporting skills.

• Experience with basic graphic editing (Canva/Photoshop) is a plus.

• Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English.

• Self-motivated, reliable, and able to work independently with minimal supervision.

________________________________________

Qualifications

• Minimum 2 years’ experience in affiliate marketing, SEO, or website management.

• Demonstrated success in growing traffic and affiliate revenue.

• Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, IT, Business, or related field (preferred, not required).

________________________________________

Reporting Structure

• Reports directly to: Business Owner & Offshore Team Manager

• Works closely with: In house Content writers, designers, SEO consultants (as required).

________________________________________

Remuneration & Benefits

• Competitive salary in PHP (based on experience).

• Performance-based incentives/bonuses linked to revenue growth.

• Salary will be received every 15th or 16th day of each month.

• Holidays: 20 days paid holiday per year accrued.

• Sick Leave: 10 days paid sick leave per year accrued. 

• You will receive a 13th Month bonus paid each December pro-rata of your employment. Note: 13th month bonus is only applicable to staff who are still with the company on month of December. 

• Public Holidays: Australian Public Holidays

• Flexible working hours (output and results driven).

• Long-term career development with opportunities to scale responsibilities as websites grow.

• We require a one (1) month Leave Notice for any plans of Resignation. Anything before that will be deducted from your month’s salary. 

________________________________________

Equipment Must Haves: 

• Own computer or laptop & two screens (monitors).

• Excellent working headphones and video camera.

• Excellent internet connection, and back-up for any internet/power interruption.





Note: For all interested applicants, send a message here with "AMAZON I'm in" in Subject Line.

title: URGENT NEED! Video Editor for AUSTRALIAN COMPANY
description:
Job Description:

Work with a growing Australian online retailer with industry leading brands in fitness equipment, children’s play equipment and bicycles; Gain practical experience editing and finalizing digital videos for a highly diverse range of products.



You will be tasked with editing product promotional videos, instructional and short presentations. You will be working with our visual marketing team, which consists of marketing, graphics and video specialists.



Work with an Australian company that allows you to work during reasonable times. Our timezone is GMT+10.

Certified work from home and pay is on hourly basis.



About us:

As one of Australia’s top Sporting & Leisure companies with 20+ iconic brands, we’re expanding our marketing team. You’ll collaborate with our marketing team to produce videos that will be seen by millions of customers.



JOB RESPONSIBILITIES

• Editing and assembling recorded raw material into a suitable, finished product ready videos to desired target market.

• Create rough and final cuts

• Input music, dialogues, graphics and effects.

• Adapt final cuts to different platforms and resolutions



SKILLS REQUIRED

• Proven work experience as a Video Editor

• Strong editing skills, with basic knowledge in animation & audio.

• Solid experience with digital technology and editing software packages (e.g. Davinci Resolve, Premiere, After Effects and Final Cut) to edit finalise and deliver desired content.



DESIRED

• Basic animation & sound editing knowledge

• A portfolio showcasing a diverse range of skills and mediums

• Previous experience in similar videos

• Excellent communication skills

• Strong attention to detail

• Highly organised

• Able to work within Australian office hours of 9am – 5pm (GMT +10)



If you think you are the best person for the job above, please send us your CV and sample videos (preferably promotional or product videos).

description:
Dominari Solutions is hiring a full time Virtual Assistant focused on outbound calling, follow up, appointment setting, and clean CRM updates for US based clients. This is a phone heavy role. If you do not enjoy talking on the phone, or you are not comfortable handling objections and rejection, please do not apply.



This position follows US business hours, which means you will be working night shift in Philippine time. You must be reliable, consistent, and able to show up on time daily.



Work Schedule



Full time, 40 hours per week.

Night shift in PH time to align with US business hours.

Exact hours will be assigned based on the client’s time zone and campaign.



Pay and Growth



Starting pay is $5.00 per hour, paid weekly.

Pay can increase over time based on reliability, skill, results, and overall performance. Strong performers get priority for raises and better client accounts.



What You Will Do



• Make outbound calls to leads using the client’s dialer or calling system

• Follow scripts and training, then improve delivery over time with coaching

• Handle objections professionally and keep control of the conversation

• Qualify leads and set appointments when the lead is a good fit

• Log call outcomes correctly in the CRM, including notes, tags, dispositions, and follow up tasks

• Complete daily follow ups consistently and on time

• Submit a daily end of shift report in Slack with your numbers and key notes

• Communicate clearly if you have questions, issues, or blockers



What We Track



• Dials completed

• Conversations

• Qualified leads

• Appointments booked

• Follow ups completed

• CRM accuracy and completeness

• Daily report quality and consistency

• Reliability and attendance



Requirements (Read Carefully)



Clear, neutral English is required.

You must be easy to understand for US prospects on the phone.

Please do not apply if you have a heavy accent that makes it difficult for US leads to understand you.



You must be comfortable speaking on the phone for most of your shift.

Please do not apply if you dislike phone work.



You must have the following:

• Strong and stable internet connection

• Quiet workspace with minimal background noise

• Laptop or PC from 2023 or newer

• Noise cancelling headset with a good microphone

• Ability to work night shift PH time consistently



Nice to Have



• Cold calling or appointment setting experience

• Experience with CRMs such as Podio, GoHighLevel, Follow Up Boss, or similar

• Real estate, home services, or sales support experience



Important, Read the Entire Job Description



Applications are reviewed based on attention to detail. If you did not read the full post, you will not be considered.



To apply, complete this application form:





To confirm you read the entire job description, start your message with the word: DOMINARI

If you do not include DOMINARI, your application will be skipped.

title: Virtual Office Manager
description:
Haley’s Cleaning Services Is Hiring a Virtual Office Manager



About Us

Haley’s Cleaning Services is a fast-growing, family-owned luxury residential and commercial cleaning company. We are a system-driven business focused on structure, consistency, and delivering a five-star client experience.

As we scale, we are restructuring our internal operations and are looking for a Virtual Office Manager to take ownership of our back-office systems, payroll, and administrative workflows. This role is ideal for someone who thrives behind the scenes, enjoys organization and accountability, and wants to grow into a leadership position over time.



Position Overview

The Virtual Office Manager is a back-office–focused role responsible for keeping internal systems organized, payroll accurate, and operations running smoothly.

This position involves light customer interaction when needed, and occasional phone coverage as a backup.

You will work closely with ownership and leadership and will play a key role in building structure as the company continues to grow.



Key Responsibilities

Office Administration

-Manage internal
 communication and follow-ups

-Attend and present Key performance indicator at the weekly office meetings

-Track company tasks, deadlines, and recurring admin workflows

-Maintain organized digital files and internal documentation





Payroll & Financial Administration (Full Ownership)

-Manage weekly payroll processes and time tracking

-Prepare and finalize payroll reports

-Upload pay documentation and schedule payments

-Track payroll-related KPIs weekly, monthly, and annually

-Maintain accuracy and confidentiality of all payroll data



Operations Support

-Assist with scheduling support and internal coordination

-Track operational metrics and performance data

-Prepare reports related to availability, scheduling accuracy, and workflow efficiency

-Support leadership with operational reporting and documentation

-Handle customer
s or confirmations when needed

-Occasionally answer phone calls as.





What We’re Looking For

-Strong English Communication Skills (written and spoken)

-Highly Organized & Detail-Oriented – you enjoy structure, checklists, and accuracy

-Reliable & Self-Managed – able to work independently with clear expectations

-Comfortable With Responsibility – especially payroll and confidential information

-Availability – flexible schedule, but able to maintain consistent working hours once established

-Growth-Oriented – interested in growing into a lead role and supporting additional businesses over time





Growth Opportunities

-Strong growth potential for the right person. As our company continues to expand, you may have the opportunity to:

-Grow into a Lead Office Manager or Leadership Role

-Earn performance-based bonuses as responsibilities increase

-Support and work across our family of sister companies as we continue to launch and scale new businesses

-Take on higher-level responsibilities and help build systems from the ground up

-Become a long-term, trusted part of a growing, multi-business organization

-Oversight of additional virtual assistants

-Support across multiple businesses under the same ownership

-Increased responsibility and compensation over time based on performance







Compensation & Schedule

Training Pay: $120–$150 per week





Post-Training Salary: $170 per week (~$600/month)





Hours: 20-30 hours per week





Schedule: Flexible, structured around availability, with consistency required once set





Location: 100% Remote





Training Provided: Yes – all systems, processes, and expectations are fully trained







How to Apply

Please submit:

A short video introducing yourself and why you’re a good fit for a back-office Office Manager role





A brief overview of your administrative, payroll, or virtual assistant experience





Your current availability (days and times)

title: Product Coordinator
description:
We are seeking a highly organised and detail-oriented Production Coordinator to support the Lendelli team and oversee production operations across the business. This role is central to ensuring every custom jewellery piece is delivered with precision, exceptional quality, and on schedule. The position plays a vital role in maintaining consistency, accuracy, and seamless coordination between the sales and production teams. 



About the Role



The Production Coordinator will manage the end-to-end coordination of custom jewellery orders — from quote approval through to final delivery. You will work closely with the sales team, suppliers, CAD designers, setters, manufacturers, and other external stakeholders to translate approved quotes into beautifully executed jewellery pieces.

This role requires strong organisational skills, attention to detail, and the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously in a fast-paced environment.

The position is primarily remote and requires excellent communication, proactive problem-solving, and confident use of digital systems.



What you'll be doing:

* Manage the full lifecycle of jewellery orders from quote approval to final delivery

* Coordinate production schedules with suppliers, including setters, CAD designers, and manufacturers

* Ensure all job details are accurately captured and updated in 

* Monitor the progress of each piece and proactively address delays or production issues

* Confirm specifications such as metal type, diamond details, finger size, and design requirements prior to production

   logistics including shipping, tracking, and quality control checks.

* Upload and review comprehensive supplier quotes

* Calculate recommended retail pricing for the sales team

* Manage job trafficking and order processing within 

* Maintain file organisation using Dropbox

* Assist with brief preparation using basic image editing software when required



What we are looking for:



* Strong experience in production coordination and operations support

* Highly organised with exceptional attention to detail

* Proficient in 
 (essential)

* Comfortable using Slack, Excel, Dropbox, and Microsoft applications

* Strong time management and ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously

* Excellent written and verbal communication skills

* Ability to work independently in a remote environment



What We Offer:



* Salary: Php 45,000 

* Leave credit available after 6 months

* Day shift role

* Permanent Work From Home Setup

* Flexible working hours, as long as 8 hours are rendered per day

* Observed Australian public holidays (selected holidays)



Kindly, fill-out this form to complete your application:

title: Senior Funnel & Ad Expert – Web Developer & Marketing Pro - $500/ Month
description:
Are you a master of funnel design, web development, and digital advertising? Do you thrive in the fast-paced world of drop shipping and performance marketing? If so, this full-time remote position is your opportunity to shine! We’re looking for a versatile and skilled professional who can bring creative ideas to life while driving measurable results.



What You’ll Do:



- Design and build high-converting funnels for e-commerce and drop shipping.

- Write compelling sales copy that converts browsers into buyers.

- Manage and optimize
, Google, and TikTok ads for maximum ROI.

- Conduct market research to identify trends and opportunities.

- Maintain and improve existing websites and funnels to ensure top performance.

- Collaborate on other development and marketing tasks as needed.



What We’re Looking For:



- Proven experience in funnel design, coding, web development, and ad management.

- A portfolio showcasing funnels, websites, or other projects you’ve developed (required).

- Strong copywriting skills and attention to detail.

- Ability to think creatively and analytically to solve problems and generate results.

- Someone who can hit the ground running and loves staying ahead of trends in the digital marketing space.



Application Process:



1. Portfolio Required: Share links to funnels, websites, and other projects you’ve built.

2. Test Funnel: Be prepared to demonstrate your skills by building a test funnel as part of the application process.

3. Prove You Read This: To confirm you’ve read this job post thoroughly, include the words FUNNEL MASTER in your application.



What’s in It for You:



- Hourly Rate: $3/hour

- Remote Opportunity: Work from anywhere and manage your time.

- Growth Potential: Expand your skills and grow with us in the exciting world of drop shipping and digital marketing.



Ready to build funnels that dominate and ads that convert? Apply now and showcase your talent!

title: Shopify Store Manager
description:
Dear Applicant,



For our fast-growing beauty brand named Faccelove, which is currently scaling rapidly and projected to reach 8 figures in revenue this year, we are looking for a highly skilled Shopify Store Manager with deep expertise in building, optimizing, and managing high-converting Shopify stores.



To confirm that you have read this message carefully, please start your reply with the word “blueberry” before introducing yourself.



Responsibilities:

- Managing and optimizing our Shopify store on a daily basis

- Updating and improving homepages, product pages, collection pages, FAQ pages, and other core pages to match high-end brand standards

- Ensuring consistent luxury branding aligned with our core audience: mature women (45+)

- Structuring the website for maximum conversion rate optimization (CRO)

- Implementing UX/UI best practices to improve user flow and retention

- Utilizing AI tools and our internal image library to enhance visual branding

- Ensuring all pages follow legal compliance (privacy, returns, shipping, terms, cookies, etc.)

- Collaborating with the creative, marketing, and operations teams

- Continuously analyzing store performance to identify improvement opportunities

- Making quick, high-impact adjustments based on data and feedback



Requirements (MUST):

- 3–5+ years of proven experience as a Shopify Store Manager

- Deep technical knowledge of Shopify, including:

- Theme customization

- Layout structuring

- Liquid basics (bonus)

- App integrations

- Conversion-oriented page building



Demonstrated ability to optimize:

- Homepages

- Product pages

- Collection pages

- Checkout flow

- Store navigation and structure

- Strong understanding of conversion psychology, UX/UI, and CRO

- Ability to create clean, premium brand experiences

- Experience working with fast-scaling e-commerce brands

- Excellent communication and ability to work independently

- Availability of 2 - 5 hours per day, 5 days per week

- Experience using Slack is a plus



Bonus (Nice to Have):

- Experience in the beauty, skincare, or wellness industry

- Familiarity with A/B testing and performance-driven store optimization

- Experience collaborating with creative strategists and marketers

- Understanding of Shopify apps for upsell, bundling, reviews, subscription, etc.



Application Requirements:

Please answer the following in your application:



- Please share your CV

- Please share your LinkedIn profile

- Please share previous work experience with other brands (Shopify-specific)

- Do you have extensive experience adjusting all Shopify pages to premium standards?

- Do you understand CRO principles to improve conversion through store optimization?

- Have you used Slack or similar tools for communication?

- Are you available 2 -5 hours daily, 5 days a week?

- Please send a voice message to 
explaining your motivation for the job.



If you do not meet all requirements, please do not apply.



We look forward to your response!

title: Bookkeeper (Real Estate)
description:
We’re looking for a **Bookkeeper** to support a real estate operator with multiple small, ancillary business entities. This role is focused on day-to-day bookkeeping execution across holding companies, rental properties, and non-real-estate operating entities that sit alongside a larger accounting team.



You will own transaction-level bookkeeping work and keep each entity clean, accurate, and up to date in QuickBooks Online. This role is ideal for someone who is comfortable managing multiple small sets of books, follows established processes closely, and takes pride in clean financial records.



If you enjoy structured work, clear SOPs, and supporting a growing portfolio without being pulled into high-level accounting or strategy, this role is a strong fit.



---



### Why You’ll Want to Join



- You will be paid in **USD** (bi-monthly: every 15th and 30th)

- Up to **14 days** of Paid Time Off annually (starting Day 1)

- Observance of **Holidays** per company guidelines

- **100% remote setup** so you can work wherever you’re most productive

- Stable workload with clearly defined responsibilities

- Opportunity to support a real estate business with multiple operating entities



---



### What You’ll Work On



**Bookkeeping Execution**



- Maintain accurate books for multiple small business entities

- Record and categorize transactions in **QuickBooks Online**

- Reconcile bank and credit card accounts on a regular basis

- Ensure transactions are coded correctly by entity and account



**Accounts Payable and Expense Tracking**



- Review and record expenses and vendor payments

- Ensure supporting documentation is properly attached in QBO

- Flag missing information or inconsistencies for follow-up

- Maintain clean expense records across all entities



**Financial Hygiene and Reconciliation**



- Perform monthly reconciliations and basic close tasks

- Identify discrepancies and resolve them proactively

- Maintain organized financial records for internal review

- Ensure books are always audit-ready and up to date



**Process Adherence and Coordination**



- Follow established SOPs and accounting workflows

- Coordinate with the internal accounting team when questions arise

- Support clean handoffs for reporting, tax prep, or review

- Manage multiple entities without letting details slip



---



### What You Bring



- **2 to 4+ years** of bookkeeping experience

- **QuickBooks Online certification is required**

- Experience managing books for multiple small businesses or entities

- Strong attention to detail and comfort working with numbers

- Familiarity with real estate, rentals, or holding companies

- Clear written English and professional communication

- Ability to work independently and follow structured processes



---



### Nice to Have



- Experience supporting real estate operators or property portfolios

- Familiarity with holding companies, rental entities, or small operating businesses

- Experience working alongside in-house accounting teams

- Comfort handling higher transaction volumes across multiple entities



---



### How to Apply



Please include:



1. Your **updated resume**

2. A **short 1–2 minute Loom video** explaining your bookkeeping experience, QuickBooks Online background, and experience managing multiple sets of books



**Only candidates who submit a Loom video will be considered.**



---



If you are detail-driven, QuickBooks-fluent, and comfortable owning bookkeeping execution across multiple small entities, this role offers steady work, clear expectations, and long-term collaboration.

title: SEO + AI Content + Social Media + WordPress Operator (Long Term)
description:
We are a growth focused online lead generation company in the automotive finance industry.



We are looking for one long term operator who can handle content execution, SEO execution, and social media posting. We use AI tools to increase efficiency, but all AI generated content must be proofread, edited, and rewritten to be original and human sounding.



This is a stable long term role with consistent hours. We are not looking for freelancers managing multiple clients. We want someone reliable who will work with one company long term.



Your Responsibilities



WordPress and SEO Execution



Publish blog posts and pages in WordPress

Format posts correctly with headings, images, and spacing

Set SEO titles and meta descriptions using Yoast or RankMath

Add internal links and image alt text

Optimize existing content when needed

Submit new URLs to Google Search Console



SEO Content Creation using AI



Use AI tools to generate content drafts

Proofread, edit, and rewrite all AI generated content to be original

Ensure content sounds natural and not AI generated

Perform basic keyword research with a long tail focus

Add FAQs and basic on page SEO improvements



Content Creation



Create short form video content using AI avatars, faceless videos, or simple edits

Edit videos using CapCut or Canva

Create image posts

Write captions and hashtags

Repurpose the same content across multiple platforms



Social Media Posting and Engagement



Post content daily on

Instagram

TikTok

 X

LinkedIn



Schedule or publish content natively

Repurpose content for each platform

Respond to basic comments

Flag high intent engagement or leads



Tools You Will Use



WordPress

ChatGPT or similar AI tools

CapCut or Canva

Yoast or RankMath

Google Search Console

Social media scheduling tools or native posting tools



Requirements



Experience with WordPress is required

Basic understanding of SEO

Experience posting content on multiple social platforms

Strong editing and proofreading skills

Comfortable using AI tools as an assistant, not a replacement

Good written English

Reliable internet connection

Available for stable long term work

Looking for one primary employer



Working Hours and Pay



Pay rate is 5 to 8 dollars per hour depending on experience

Stable 40 hours per week during EST time zone equivalent to 4:00 PM – 12:00 AM PHT

Long term consistent work

Performance based raises over time

Clear SOPs and expectations provided



How to Apply



Please answer the following questions in your application



Describe your WordPress experience

What AI tools have you used and how do you edit AI generated content

How many hours per week are you available to work

Are you looking for long term stable employment

Attach any relevant samples such as blog posts, social posts, or videos



Applications that do not answer these questions will not be considered.



Why Work With Us



Stable long term role

Consistent weekly pay

Clear instructions and processes

No micromanagement

Opportunity to grow with the company

title: Executive Assistant
description:
I’m looking for a high-level Personal Executive Assistant to work directly with me as my right hand. Someone who can be all in and give their all! This is not a basic admin role. You will operate closely with me day-to-day, helping manage my calendar, priorities, communication, projects, and personal logistics as we continue scaling a fast-growing company. looking for someone with experience as an executive assistant.



I am the co-founder of BookDrop, a rapidly growing bulk book logistics and resale company. We operate high-volume warehouse systems, advanced data tracking, and fast-moving operational workflows. As we scale, I need someone who can think ahead, stay organized under pressure, and help me execute at a higher level across both business and personal responsibilities.



You will work extremely closely with me. Expect fast communication, changing priorities, and high standards. The right person will grow with the company and become deeply integrated into how I operate. I need someone who is all in!



This is a full-time remote role based in the Philippines, working Arizona hours (7:00 AM to 4:00 PM).



What You’ll Be Responsible For



You will help manage both executive operations and personal execution, including:

Acting as my right-hand assistant in daily decision support and execution

Managing my calendar, scheduling, reminders, and priority alignment

Handling administrative coordination across business and personal tasks

Supporting special projects tied to operations, growth, and leadership

Organizing communication, follow-ups, and task tracking

Building and maintaining structured systems in Excel and other tools

Performing data analysis and helping translate numbers into clear insights

Assisting with website updates, automation, or tech workflows when needed

Helping me stay focused by reducing noise and managing logistics behind the scenes

This role requires someone proactive. You don’t wait to be told every step. You anticipate problems and bring solutions.



Required Skills and Experience



Advanced Google Sheet skills (complex formulas, pivots, data organization)

Strong English communication skills, written and verbal

Highly organized with the ability to manage multiple priorities

Tech-savvy and comfortable learning new tools quickly

Reliable internet connection and ability to work USA hours

Comfortable using TimeDoctor for time tracking

Ability to work closely with a fast-moving executive environment



Preferred Experience





Experience supporting a founder, COO, or C-level leader

Project management tools or workflow systems

Automation tools, light coding, or systems thinking

Graphic design or website management experience



Who Will Thrive in This Role



The ideal candidate is:



Extremely organized but also adaptable

Calm under pressure and comfortable with high expectations

Detail-oriented without losing sight of the big picture

Direct communicator who can think independently

Motivated by growth and long-term opportunity

Someone who wants to become deeply trusted and integrated into an executive’s workflow

You are not just completing tasks. You are helping build structure around a growing company and the person helping lead it.







How to Apply



To be considered, you must:

Send your resume to 

Include a ~2-minute video explaining:

Why you believe you are a strong fit

A complex problem you solved and how you approached it

Your level of Google Sheet and Google Calendar expertise and past relevant experience



Applications without both the resume and video will not be reviewed.

We are looking to hire two candidates immediately.
