title: Video Editor for Meta Ads
description:
We're a fast-growing wellness brand operating across Sweden, Denmark, Norway and Finland. We're looking for a skilled video editor to join our creative team and help scale our paid advertising efforts.



The Role

You'll be editing short-form video ads for Meta. The editing style is clean and simple – no flashy effects or complex motion graphics. What matters is precision, pacing, and understanding what makes content convert in the Scandinavian market.



A core part of this role is iterating on winning ads. When something works, you need to produce variations – new hooks, different CTAs, adjusted pacing – to maximize performance.



Requirements:



1. Experience editing for Scandinavian brands or audiences

2. Strong understanding of direct-response advertising and what drives conversions

3. Ability to work fast and turn around edits quickly

4. Fluency in creating ad variations and iterations systematically

5. Proficiency in Premiere Pro, Final Cut, or equivalent



Who You Are

You're ambitious and want to grow. You take ownership of your work and don't need to be micromanaged. Laziness is a dealbreaker – we move fast and expect the same from everyone on the team.



You're proactive, suggest improvements, and care about results – not just checking boxes.



To Apply

Send us your portfolio with examples of ad content you've edited, particularly any work for Nordic markets.



If you've read this far and are serious about the role, include the keyword "apple" in your application so we know you've paid attention.

title: Client Success Marketing Coordinator (B2B SaaS | EST)
description:
About Us

We are a B2B SaaS Marketing Agency helping SaaS founders grow through strong execution and organized delivery. Small team, high ownership, long-term roles.



Role Overview

You will support our Client Success and Marketing Delivery team internally.

This is not a pure support or social media role and you are not the main client account owner.



Your focus is keeping marketing delivery organized, timelines moving, and client information clean. Some light client communication is involved, but the role is mainly internal coordination and workflow management.



Responsibilities

- Track deliverables, deadlines, approvals, and revisions

- Coordinate between strategy, creatives, and fulfillment teams

- Keep task boards and pipelines organized

- Assist with weekly progress updates and Loom reports

- Maintain client documents, folders, and channels

- Track invoices and follow up on overdue payments when needed

- Flag delays or issues early



Requirements

- Excellent English communication

- Strong organization and time management

- Experience in marketing coordination, project management, or agency work

- Comfortable handling multiple projects at once

- Detail-oriented and reliable

- Available during EST hours

Nice to Have: ClickUp, Notion, Slack, Google Drive, SaaS or agency experience.

title: Social Media Manager
description:
We are The Cravery Cakes, a fast-growing premium cake brand based in Birmingham, UK, and we're searching for an exceptional Social Media Manager to join our team.

title: Technical Support Specialist (Open to Fresh Graduates)
description:
**NEW GRADUATES WITH A DEGREE IN IT OR COMPUTER SCIENCE ARE ENCOURAGED TO APPLY – TRAINING WILL BE PROVIDED**



About the position:

We are looking for a detail-oriented and customer-focused Technical Support Specialist to join a remote team. In this role, you will handle inbound support inquiries, assist with troubleshooting, and provide clear, helpful guidance to users.



This position is ideal for individuals who enjoy problem-solving, learning new tools, and delivering excellent support experiences.



Responsibilities:

• Monitor, troubleshoot, and respond to inbound support inquiries in a timely and professional manner

• Provide clear, accurate, and easy-to-understand responses based on user needs

• Create, update, and track support tickets using internal systems

• Escalate issues appropriately while maintaining proper documentation

• Take time to understand user concerns to provide relevant and effective support

• Follow established processes while remaining flexible to handle different scenarios

• Maintain a customer-first and solutions-oriented approach



Requirements:

• Fresh graduates or entry-level candidates with foundational knowledge in IT, Computer Science, or related fields are welcome to apply

• Excellent English communication skills (verbal, written, and reading) – MUST

• Prior experience in customer or technical support – ADVANTAGE

• Familiarity with ticketing or CRM systems – ADVANTAGE

• Strong attention to detail and ability to follow instructions

• Basic computer literacy and ability to navigate multiple tools or systems

• Willingness to learn new platforms, processes, and technical concepts

• Strong problem-solving and critical-thinking skills

• Ability to work independently while collaborating with a remote team

• Positive attitude, professionalism, and strong work ethic

• Exposure to websites, online platforms, or digital tools

• Basic understanding of troubleshooting or technical workflows



Work Schedule:

• This is a full-time position in a work-from-home setup. You will be working 8 hours a day, 5 days a week.



TO APPLY FOR THIS POSITION, FOLLOW THE INSTRUCTIONS BELOW:

2. Send a Cover Letter with a link to your CV/Resume



***APPLICATIONS WITHOUT CVS/RESUMES WILL NOT BE CONSIDERED***

title: STR Operations Assistant
description:
Operations Assistant: Elevate Vacation Homes | U.S.-Based (San Diego, CA)



Read this carefully before applying.



We are a small but growing vacation rental company based in U.S. (San Diego, CA) managing 40+ properties, with 90% located in San Diego, California.

Our team is lean by design:

- 1 CEO

- 1 COO

- 1 CFO

- 2 Operations Assistants



We are now hiring one more Operations Assistant — and this is an important role. We are not hiring in volume. We are hiring one person we can grow with as we scale to 80–100 properties. If you perform well and stay with us, this role will naturally grow into a higher position when we expand.



Important Context (Read This Carefully)

We have been hiring and letting people go over the last 6 months. Not because of pay. Not because of workload. But because we are very selective and have not yet found the right long-term fit.



This role requires:

- Strong communication

- Good judgment

- Ownership

- Reliability under pressure



If you’re confident in your ability, this is a rare opportunity to join early and grow with the company. If you’re unsure, this is not the role for you. This Role Is For One Type of Person Only



You are:

- Fluent in spoken and written English

- Comfortable speaking on the phone with:

- Guests

- Vendors

- Homeowners

- Calm, logical, and clear under pressure

- Able to manage multiple issues at once

- A strong problem solver

- Someone who finishes what they start



You are not:

- A task-only VA

- Someone who avoids calls

- Someone who needs constant direction

- Someone who panics under stress

- Someone who relies on AI to communicate



Communication Expectations (Very Important)

You should expect:

- 5–20 phone calls per day



Daily coordination with:

- Cleaning teams

- Maintenance vendors

- Internal staff



If you are not confident speaking English on calls, do not apply.



What You’ll Actually Be Doing: This is not a customer service role.

Approximate breakdown:

- 10% Guest communication

- 5% Cleaning reminders

- 5% Ordering supplies

- 80% Operations, coordination, and problem-solving



You will function as:

- A project manager

- A communicator between teams

- A problem-solver when things go wrong

- A key operations support role



Work Environment

- Small, fast-moving startup

- High accountability

- Clear expectations

- Real responsibility

- Direct communication with leadership

- Opportunity to grow as the company scales



Compensation & Benefits

- Up to $8.00 USD/hour (based on performance)

- 10 days paid time off per year

- 2 days off per week

- Long-term role with growth potential

- Promotion opportunity as we scale to 80–100 properties



Final Note: We are not looking to hire quickly. We are looking to hire correctly. If you believe your experience, communication skills, and work ethic make you a strong fit — apply. If you are unsure, this role is not for you.



How to Apply



If you believe you are a strong fit and meet all of the requirements above, apply using the link below.





Important:

Applications that are dis-honest, incomplete, generic, or clearly copy-pasted will be ignored. We are only moving forward with candidates who demonstrate strong communication, attention to detail, and professionalism. If you’re confident in your abilities and want to grow with a serious team — apply now.

title: HighLevel Automation Expert Needed
description:
We are looking for an experienced automation specialist with a background in construction who can review, improve, and help fix our current lead automation systems (GoHighLevel).



Important disclaimer: we already understand how to build basic automations and workflows. We are not looking for someone to explain simple triggers, tags, or basic
 sequences. We need someone with advanced, real world experience who can demonstrate proven systems and help us implement more effective, scalable automations for lead nurturing and re engagement.



Our goal is to keep leads properly looped into follow ups and rehash campaigns, with smart logic, clean data flow, strong deliverability, and reliable internal visibility. The specialist must also have experience routing and sending all leads into Slack for team notifications and tracking.



We will provide the automation flow details prior to the initial call so you can review and have a better understanding of our goals.



Send us your portfolio and case studies.

title: Assistant Office Manager
description:
**PLEASE DO NOT APPLY IF YOU DO NOT HAVE PREVIOUS VA EXPERIENCE WITHIN THE HVAC OR TRADE-RELATED INDUSTRIES, SUCH AS ROOFING, PLUMBING, SOLAR, ELECTRICAL, OR GENERAL CONSTRUCTION.**

We are seeking a highly organized and detail-oriented Assistant Office Manager to provide remote administrative and operational support. mbers

mbers

title: Lead Operations VA / Team Manager – U.S. Event Parking Business
description:
Lead Operations VA / Team Manager – U.S. Event Parking Business



Location: Remote (Philippines Preferred)

Schedule: Candidate must remain available and responsive during U.S. event hours (Approx. 9 AM – 9 PM EST). Workload varies depending on order volume. Candidate must remain available and responsive to ensure all urgent tasks and responsibilities are completed.  

Compensation: $1,000 USD / month (Paid Bi-Weekly)

Position Type: Long-Term, Full-Time

Start Date: ASAP



About Our Company

We operate a fast-growing U.S.-based parking business. We purchase and sell event parking passes for major sports, concerts, and entertainment events across the United States using trusted ticket marketplace platforms.



We currently operate with a team of fulfillment and purchasing assistants and are hiring a Lead Operations VA to manage daily workflow, oversee team performance, and handle more advanced operational tasks.



This role is ideal for someone who enjoys managing teams, solving problems, and owning daily execution of a business.



Your Role



You will act as the main operations manager and team leader. Your job is to ensure all daily orders are fulfilled accurately and on time while coordinating our VA team and handling higher-level tasks such as disputes and urgent orders.

You will be trained directly by the business owner through live calls and training videos.



Primary Responsibilities



Order Fulfillment & Urgent Order Handling

• Monitor incoming orders through
 and fulfillment portals

• Personally handle urgent orders (events happening within the next few days)

• Assign simple orders to fulfillment VAs through daily task lists

• Ensure all orders are completed accurately and before event start time

• Troubleshoot fulfillment issues and find replacement passes if needed



Team Leadership & Task Management

• Manage and assign daily work to fulfillment VAs and buyer VAs

• Create and post daily task lists inside team group chats

• Ensure tea
mbers follow buying and fulfillment rules

• Review completed tasks for accuracy

• Serve as the first point of contact for team questions or issues



Dispute & Customer Support Management

• Review order disputes and platform customer claims

• Collect supporting evidence and submit dispute responses

• Track dispute status

• Communicate with marketplace support teams when necessary

• Escalate only complex or high-risk cases to the business owner



Inventory & Listing Support

• Monitor live, day-of-event inventory and help ensure passes sell before event start



System & Data Accuracy

• Maintain order and dispute tracking inside Airtable

• Keep internal systems updated and accurate

• Help improve workflow processes and suggest efficiency improvements

• Assist in documenting recurring procedures and team training material



Communication & Reporting

• Manage centralized business inbox

• Provide daily summary updates to business owner via WhatsApp

• Report key updates such as urgent issues, disputes, and inventory risk



What Success Looks Like



Urgent orders are fulfilled same day

VA team stays organized and productive

Minimal order cancellations or fulfillment mistakes

Disputes are tracked and submitted properly and promptly

Business owner rarely needs to step into daily operations



What A Day Looks Like



Complete all urgent orders (events happening within 3 days or marked urgent by exchange)

Create fulfillment list for fulfillment team

Complete backlogged and new order disputes

Monitor
 inbox for live orders for day of events

Promptly resolve any issues and communicate with the owner if problems arise



Requirements

• Strong English writing and communication skills

• Experience managing or leading remote teams preferred

• Experience in e-commerce and marketplace operations is a major plus

• Strong attention to detail

• Ability to follow rules and workflows consistently

• Comfortable learning new software and portals quickly

• Ability to problem solve independently

• Stable high-speed internet and reliable power backup



Software You Will Use (Training Provided)



Airtable

Gmail

Ticket marketplace portals

Parking vendor sites

Password manager systems

WhatsApp group chats



Training & Growth Opportunity

You will receive structured training and ongoing support from the business owner. This role is designed to grow into a long-term operations leadership position as the company expands.

Reliable and high-performing tea
mbers will receive increased responsibility and potential performance bonuses.



How To Apply



To be considered, please include:



A short paragraph describing your experience managing teams or workflows



Your internet speed screenshot



Your availability in EST hours



Answer these questions:

If two urgent orders arrive at the same time and both need to be completed within one hour, how would you prioritize and handle them?



If a customer claims their parking pass did not work at the event, but your records show the pass was delivered on time and successfully purchased from the vendor, how would you investigate and respond? Please explain your step-by-step process and include a short example message you would send to the platform.



Applications missing these items will not be reviewed.

title: YouTube Video Editor / Motion Graphics
description:
We’re hiring a video editor to create high-quality, engaging explainer videos for YouTube.



This role focuses on realistic visuals and clean animations, not flashy or generic edits. You’ll be working from a provided script and visual direction to produce 6–8 minute videos that clearly explain real-world events and systems.



Responsibilities:



High-quality video editing



Realistic motion graphics and animations



Thoughtful use of stock footage and diagrams



Smooth pacing and transitions



Voiceover and sound design



Final polish suitable for long-form YouTube

title: Acquisitions Manager
description:
About Us



We are a mission-driven real estate investment company that specializes in acquiring off-market properties burdened with title issues, unpaid tax liens, and unresolved inheritance claims. We believe that helping families resolve complex property issues creates value for communities — and that begins with a human conversation.





About the Role



We’re looking for a warm, patient, and resourceful communicator to join our team as an Acquisitions Manager. Your primary responsibility is to establish initial contact with potential heirs, build trust, and gather key information to help us resolve title issues and facilitate a successful property acquisition.



This is not a high-pressure sales role. It's about empathy, understanding, and guiding people through situations they may not even know they’re involved in. Many heirs are unaware of their connection to a property — your job is to help them understand their position, feel supported, and know what’s next.





Core Responsibilities



Make outbound calls to individuals who may be heirs to distressed or inherited real estate.



Explain situations clearly, calmly, and with compassion — especially in sensitive cases involving probate or family loss.



Build rapport and conduct guided interviews to identify other potential heirs, gather legal details, and document chain of ownership.



Accurately record all findings and conversations in our CRM and internal systems.



Coordinate with researchers, title curative specialists, and acquisitions staff to keep the process moving forward.



Handle follow-ups professionally and persistently across multiple parties.



Be a calm, confident voice when people feel uncertain or overwhelmed.





Ideal Candidate Profile



You’re curious, empathetic, and naturally conversational



You have experience in customer service, case management, counseling, interviewing, or outreach roles.



You’re comfortable navigating difficult, emotional, or complex conversations with tact and sensitivity.



You can stay organized across multiple leads and cases.



You enjoy being part of a mission-driven team that’s solving real problems.



You’re comfortable with some ambiguity — and skilled at gathering facts from people who may not know the whole story.





Bonus Points If You Have:



Experience working with probate, estate matters, real estate title issues.



Background in real estate investing, surplus funds/excess proceeds, or solar sales.



Familiarity with CRMs (Podio, Salesforce, REI-specific tools) and call-tracking systems



Spanish or other language fluency (but not required)





What Success Looks Like



Consistent contact with heirs and responsible parties



Clear, well-documented communication trails



Smooth collaboration with internal researchers and title partners



Building relationships, not burning bridges — even when people are skeptical or confused.



Helping us move from “unreachable” to “ready to sign” — with empathy, not pressure



Compensation: $5/hr + $250/deal





How to Apply



If this sounds like you, please
 
 with the subject line: REI Acq Mgr Application.

Include a brief note about why this role resonates with you, and any experience you have in lead management, excess proceeds, or inheritance/property work. Also include your DISC scores: 
/disc-personality-test/

title: Customer Support Specialist
description:
***PLEASE APPLY ONLY IF YOU HAVE PRIOR CUSTOMER SUPPORT EXPERIENCE WITHIN HVAC OR TRADE-RELATED INDUSTRIES, SUCH AS ROOFING, PLUMBING, SOLAR, ELECTRICAL, OR GENERAL CONSTRUCTION.***



About the position:

We are looking for a reliable and detail-oriented Customer Support Specialist to provide day-to-day operational and customer assistance in a remote work setup. This role focuses on handling inquiries, managing service requests, and ensuring smooth coordination across internal workflows.



The ideal candidate is highly organized, communicates clearly, and can manage multiple tasks in a fast-paced environment while maintaining a high level of professionalism and customer satisfaction.

 	

Responsibilities:

• Handle inbound and outbound customer inquiries via phone,
, chat, and messaging platforms

• Coordinate scheduling, service requests, and follow-ups based on established processes

• Create, update, and manage work orders and records using internal systems

• Process transactions, requests, and documentation accurately and on time

• Address customer concerns and provide timely, effective resolutions

• Maintain clear and accurate records of all interactions and tasks

• Collaborate with internal tea
mbers to ensure efficient workflow execution



Requirements:

• Excellent English communication skills (verbal, written, and reading) – MUST

• Proven experience in customer support handling phone,
, and chat interactions – MUST

• Prior experience supporting service-based or field operations – MUST

• Familiarity with CRM or ticketing systems – ADVANTAGE

• Previous leadership or supervisory experience – ADVANTAGE

• Ability to multitask, prioritize, and work efficiently in a fast-paced environment

• Strong problem-solving and conflict-resolution skills

• High level of computer literacy and system navigation skills

• Ability to quickly learn new tools and internal processes

• Strong time management and organizational skills

• Ability to work independently while maintaining strong collaboration with a remote team

• Positive, proactive attitude with a customer-focused mindset

• Experience handling operational or scheduling-related tasks



Work Schedule:

• This is a full-time position in a work-from-home setup. You will be working 8.5 hours a day, 5 days a week.

	

TO APPLY FOR THIS POSITION, FOLLOW THE INSTRUCTIONS BELOW:

1. Include "SUPPORT" in your subject line

2. Send a cover letter with a link to your CV/Resume



***APPLICATIONS WITHOUT CVS/RESUMES WILL NOT BE CONSIDERED***

title: Part-Time Cold Caller (Home Remodeling)
description:
We’re looking for an experienced part-time (MALE) cold caller for a home remodeling company.



Requirements:

• Cold calling experience

• Clear English speaking voice

• Comfortable following a script

Comfortable using GoHighLevel



To apply:

Please send a voice recording (1 minute or less) reading the sample script below.



Sample Script:

Hi, this is [Your Name] calling from Morrison Construction.



We received your inquiry about a bathroom remodeling project and just wanted to check if you’re still interested in moving forward.



We’re offering a free in-home estimate where our specialist can go over options and pricing. Would you be open to scheduling that?

title: High-Volume Lead Scout: Texas/Florida Market (Base + High Bounty)
description:
The Mission:

Wrench & Wire Recruiting is a national exchange for the plumbing and electrical trades. We are NOT a typical agency. We have a custom-built "Blind Hiring" platform. We need 20 Candidates and 6 Employers per day. We have the tracking in place; now we need the volume.

The Role:

You will dominate the Texas and Florida markets by harvesting leads from
 groups. This is a "get your hands dirty" role. You will join 50+ groups, post our high-converting scripts, and hunt for every person saying "I need work" or "I am hiring."

KPIs (Your Goals or You’re Out):

• 100% Daily Reporting: You must log every group joined and every post made.

• Minimum Volume: 10 "Verified" candidates per day to start, scaling to 20.

• Performance Clause: If you do not produce at least 5 "Verified" leads within your first 48 hours, the contract will be terminated.

Compensation:

• Base Salary: $4.00/hr.

• Candidate Bonus: $3.00 per Verified Candidate.

• Employer Bonus: $8.00 per Verified Employer Agreement.

--- MANDATORY APPLICATION TEST ---

To be considered, you MUST include the answers to these 3 questions in your application. Applications without these answers will be ignored.

1. Find 3 active
 groups specifically for 'Electricians in Texas' or 'Plumbers in Florida.' List the names/links of the groups.

2. Write a 3-sentence post that would convince a 10-year Master Electrician to click a link for a job that has 'Zero Worker Tax' (meaning we don't take a cut of their pay).

3. Tell me how you would handle a
 group admin who deletes your post.

title: Integrator / Head of Operations & Execution — DTC Supplement Brand (7-Figure)
description:
Job Title: Integrator / Head of Operations & Execution — DTC Supplement Brand (7-Figure)

Salary: $2,000–$3,000/month + Profit Share Bonus

Hours: Part-Time (20 hrs/week) ? Full-Time after 3 months

Timezone: GMT+1 to GMT+4 (European / Middle Eastern business hours)



About Us

Parmint is a 7-figure DTC supplement brand specializing in internal body freshness. We sell directly to consumers through high-converting funnels,
/Meta ads, and
 marketing. Our core product helps people feel confident from the inside out — and we're growing fast.

We're looking for an Integrator — someone who can take the founder's vision and turn it into reality. You'll be the operational backbone of the company: building systems, managing people, executing strategies, and making sure nothing falls through the cracks.

This is NOT a virtual assistant role. This is a leadership position for someone who wants to help build and run a real company — with skin in the game through profit sharing.



What You'll Do



Operations & Systems: Create SOPs, workflows, and processes from scratch. Build the operational infrastructure that allows the company to scale without the founder being involved in every decision.

Team Management: Help identify, hire, and manage tea
mbers (video editors, customer service, copywriters, media buyers). You'll be their point of contact and make sure everyone delivers on time and on quality.

Marketing Execution: Oversee the execution of
/Meta ad campaigns,
 sequences (Klaviyo), quiz funnels, landing pages, and creative production. You don't need to be the one running ads — but you need to deeply understand how DTC marketing works so you can manage people who do.

Project Management: Keep all moving parts organized. From ad creative production to product launches to customer service escalations — you make sure things get done.

Financial Oversight: Help track budgets, manage invoices, reconcile expenses, and keep the founder informed on financial health.

Strategic Support: Provide input on decisions, flag problems before they become crises, and bring structure to the founder's ideas.





Required



You've worked inside a DTC brand or agency (ideally $1M–$10M range). You know what a funnel is, how
 ads work, what Klaviyo does, and why AOV, LTV, and ROAS matter.

You've built or managed systems, processes, or teams in a previous role.

English fluency (written and spoken) — non-negotiable.

Available during GMT+1 to GMT+4 business hours.

Self-starter: you see a problem, you flag it, you propose a solution, you execute.

Detail-oriented and patient. You double-check everything and care about doing things right.



Nice to Have



Experience in a supplement or health brand, especially marketing health products on Meta.

Hands-on experience with Shopify, Klaviyo, ClickFunnels, or similar tools.

Spanish or Italian language skills.





Compensation



Base: $2,000–$3,000/month (based on experience and location)

Bonus: 5–10% of net profits after 3-month trial period

Growth: This role grows into a full COO position as the company scales





How It Works

Month 1–2 (Part-Time, ~20 hrs/week): You'll audit Parmint's operations — ads, funnels,
, team, customer journey — and present an action plan with prioritized SOPs. This is our mutual test.

Month 3 (Decision Point): If the plan is solid and execution is strong, we move to full-time and profit sharing kicks in.

Month 4+ (Full-Time): You build systems, hire and manage the team, and run day-to-day operations. The founder focuses exclusively on growth strategy.



How to Apply

Send an
 to [YOUR
] with the subject: "Integrator — [Your Name]"

Include:



A short intro about yourself (2–3 paragraphs max). Who are you, what have you done, why does this role interest you?

Your experience with DTC/e-commerce brands. What brands did you work with? What was your role? What results did you achieve?

A 2-minute Loom video introducing yourself and explaining why you'd be a great fit. (Mandatory — applications without a video will not be reviewed.)

Your salary expectation (monthly, USD).



No generic cover letters. No AI-generated copy-paste applications. We read every application personally.

title: Rock Star Virtual Assistant (Trial-to-Full-Time Opportunity)
description:
Have you been overlooked?



Have you been searching for months… maybe even over a year… applying again and again, only to hear nothing back? 



Or worse — rejection after rejection?



You know you’re capable. You know you work hard.



But the right opportunity just hasn’t shown up yet.



Read this carefully.



Because this may be the opportunity you’ve been waiting for.



What’s happening right now



In the next 7 hours, I’m bringing five people onto my team for a paid day of work.



From those five:

- We will narrow it down to two top performers

- Those two will work with me for one full month

- From there, one or both may be invited to join our team full-time



This is not theory.



This is real work, real pay, real opportunity.



Who this role is for

- I’m not looking for someone with a perfect resume.

- I’m looking for someone who is:

- Hungry to prove themselves

- Reliable and takes ownership

- Coach­able and willing to learn fast

- Detail-oriented and follows instructions

- Persistent, not easily discouraged



Ready to say: “Just give me a chance.”



If you’ve been overlooked — this post is speaking to you.



What you’ll be doing



During the trial and beyond, you may help with:

- Online research & data organization

- Basic admin and task support

- Content-related assistance

- Communication and follow-ups

- Learning new systems and tools quickly



More important than experience is your attitude, effort, and execution.



We will teach you valuable, real-world skills that go far beyond this role.



Why this is different



This is not a random VA job.



This is:

- A merit-based opportunity

- A chance to grow into a long-term role

- Exposure to real business operations

- A team that values work ethic over credentials

If you perform well, this can change your career trajectory.



IMPORTANT: How to apply (read carefully)

To apply, you must follow instructions. This is part of the test.



When you apply:

Start your message with the words:

1. “I am ready to earn this opportunity.”

2. Tell me why this opportunity matters to you

3. Tell me why you believe you deserve one of the five trial spots

4. Briefly share:

- Your availability

- Your internet reliability

- One example of a time you had to push through rejection or difficulty



~ Applications that don’t follow instructions will not be considered.~



A message directly to Filipino applicants

I know there is incredible talent in the Philippines that often gets overlooked.



If you are:

- Skilled but unseen

- Capable but underestimated

- Willing to work hard for a real chance

- This is me opening the door.

Now it’s up to you to walk through it.



P.S. – Read this carefully. Keep a close eye on this job post and pin it to the top. I will be inviting a few of you very soon to hop on a Zoom group interview as I begin selecting my first 5 people. If you miss the message, you miss the opportunity.



Only 5 spots. Selection begins shortly. Apply now.

title: AI-Integrated Video Editor & Motion Designer (Finance)
description:
OVERVIEW:

We are seeking a forward-thinking Video Editor who is highly proficient in AI image generation and animation. This is not a traditional stock-footage editing role. You will be responsible for using AI tools to generate consistent character assets and environments, animating those assets, and editing them into a seamless, professional educational experience. We provide the script, voiceover and image prompts to use for your chosen AI—you provide the visual world to create 10–25 minute educational finance videos.



You must be comfortable with high-volume, repetitive creative work and have a deep understanding of how to keep a recurring character looking identical across hundreds of prompts.



This role is structured as a Contract-to-Permanent engagement. We will initiate our partnership with a single, paid project to ensure a perfect alignment of creative vision and workflow. If the collaboration is a success for both parties, we intend to transition this into a long-term, full-time role with a consistent production schedule.



The Challenge: Consistency at Scale:

The primary challenge of this role is Character Continuity. You must be able to generate a central character who maintains the exact same facial features, clothing style, and "vibe" across a 25-minute video involving hundreds of unique scenes. This requires a mastery of AI prompting (Character References/LoRAs) and the patience to handle the high-volume, repetitive nature of long-form production.



The Role:

I will provide the script, image prompts and the voiceover file. Your job is to:

 1 Prompt & Generate: Create all visual assets using AI (following a specific "clean minimalist" 2D style) using the AI generation model of your choice (Chat GPT, Gemini or etc.)

 2 Image Animation: Use AI video tools (Grok, Runway, Luma, Kling, Pika) or manual techniques (After Effects Parallax/Puppet tools) to bring static AI images to life.

 3 Construct: Edit the full 10–25 minute video, ensuring the pacing is perfect for an educational YouTube audience.

 4 Educational Editing: Structure the video to help viewers digest complex financial topics. Use text overlays, data visualizations, and pacing that aids learning.

 5 Volume Management: Efficiently manage the "marathon" workflow of creating a 25-minute video while maintaining high quality from minute 1 to minute 25 without a drop in quality. Must videos will run 10-20 mins with some being a little longer and some may be a little shorter.



Requirements:

 • Advanced AI Toolkit: Expert-level knowledge of AI image generation and video-to-video or image-to-video tools.

 • Portfolio of Consistency: You must demonstrate previous work where an AI-generated character remains consistent across multiple scenes.

 • Finance/Education Familiarity: An understanding of how to visualize financial concepts (bull/bear markets, interest rates, portfolio balancing) through clean, professional imagery.

 • Technical Editing: Proficiency in Adobe Premiere Pro or DaVinci Resolve for the final assembly and sound design.

 • Process-Oriented & Stamina: Ability to handle the repetitive nature of generating assets for long-form content while maintaining a "premium" finish.



Application Instructions:

* Examples of AI-generated characters where you maintained consistency across different environments/poses.

* A brief note on your preferred AI stack for character consistency.

title: Virtual PA|Education Leadership
description:
Education Leadership | Executive-Level Support | Remote (USA – CT)



This role is for former or current education leaders only.

It supports confidential, executive-level work in alternative high school education (ages 16–20).



If you have not worked in school leadership, do not apply.



?



Eligibility (All Required)



Applicants must meet ALL criteria below:

• Held a school leadership role

(Principal, Assistant Principal, Executive Director, Dean, Director of Teaching & Learning, Director of Academic Programs)

• Extensive experience supporting executive or leadership operations (not classroom instruction)

• Advanced technology proficiency, including:

• Creating modern, executive-level PowerPoint presentations

• Building and managing Google Forms

• Collecting, organizing, and analyzing data

• Strong experience with Excel spreadsheets

• Creating professional reports and deliverable action plans

• Proven ability to produce elite, executive-ready work

• Able to work independently with minimal direction

• Comfortable handling confidential and sensitive information

• Available during Central Time (USA) business hours



Teacher-only or instructional-only backgrounds will be declined.



?



Work Schedule (Non-Negotiable)

• 4 hours per day

• Central Time (USA)

• Availability window: 7:00 AM – 4:00 PM CT

• Exact daily time block TBA



?



Scope of Work

• Executive administrative and leadership support

• Creating and editing professional PowerPoint presentations

• Designing Google Forms and managing data collection

• Analyzing data and building Excel-based reports

• Drafting executive summaries and action plans

• Managing leadership tasks, follow-ups, and timelines

• Producing polished deliverables without micromanagement



?



Required Application Materials (Non-Negotiable)



Applicants must submit both of the following:

1. PowerPoint sample you personally created

• Must reflect executive-level, professional work

• Educational leadership context preferred

2. Excel screenshot demonstrating data work

• Data tracking, analysis, reporting, or dashboards

• Sensitive information may be redacted



Applications missing either item will not be reviewed.



?



Screening Process (Mandatory)



This role includes a two-part paid mock trial:

1. Mock Trial 1: 6–8 hours — $25 USD flat

2. Mock Trial 2: 6–8 hours — $25 USD flat



Total mock compensation: $50 USD



If selected after both mock trials:

• $4/hour (initial onboarding rate)

• Rate review after successful 60–90 day performance

• Long-term, consistent work



Failure to follow instructions exactly will result in disqualification.



?



This Role Is NOT

• Teaching

• Lesson planning

• Curriculum development

• Student-facing instruction



?



How to Apply



Only applicants who meet all eligibility criteria and submit all required materials will receive screening instructions.



Incomplete or misaligned applications will not be reviewed.

title: Experienced Dropshipping VA / Partner (Profit Share + Long-Term Role)
description:
Hello, my name is Rasheen.



I’m looking to build a long-term partnership with an experienced dropshipping expert who wants to grow something big together.



I am not looking for a one-time gig. I am looking for someone who wants to be part of building multiple profitable stores over time and earn a percentage of the profits as we scale.



I have capital ready for ad spend, tools, and whatever is needed to build a successful store. What I need is someone experienced who knows how to move fast, choose the right direction, and build a store that generates consistent profits.



My goal is to reach at least $1,500 in weekly profit as quickly and efficiently as possible.



?



What I Need Help With:



You will guide the direction and execution, including:

	•	Advising which platform is best to start with:

	•	TikTok Shop dropshipping

	•	Shopify dropshipping

	•	Amazon

	•	Walmart

	•	Building the store from scratch

	•	Product research and finding winning products

title: Part-Time Short-Form Video Editor (Remote)
description:
About the Role

We are looking for a reliable and creative short-form video editor to join our growing media team. This role focuses on editing engaging, fast-paced content for platforms like YouTube Shorts, Instagram Reels, and TikTok. You’ll work with raw footage, B-roll, and brand assets to produce polished videos that match our style and messaging.



This is a remote, part-time position for someone who can work independently, meet deadlines, and grow with the team over time.



Key Responsibilities



Edit short-form videos (15–90 seconds) for social media platforms



Add captions, transitions, music, and graphics to enhance engagement



Follow brand guidelines for colors, fonts, and style

Organize and manage video files and project folders



Deliver projects on schedule with minimal supervision



Communicate progress and ask questions when needed



Required Skills



Strong experience with CapCut



Working knowledge of Adobe Premiere Pro



Experience with Canva for graphics and simple designs



Understanding of social media video formats and trends



Ability to add captions and motion graphics



Good English communication skills



Reliable internet connection and consistent availability



Preferred (but not required)



Experience editing real estate or lifestyle content



Basic knowledge of YouTube, Instagram, and TikTok algorithms



Ability to create simple thumbnails or social media graphics



Experience working with remote teams



What We’re Looking For



Someone dependable who can work without constant supervision



Detail-oriented and organized



Open to feedback and willing to improve



Interested in growing with a long-term team



To Apply

Please include:

Links to 3–5 short-form videos you’ve edited



Your hourly rate



Your availability (days and hours)



We’re looking for someone who wants a stable, long-term role with a team that produces high-quality content every week.

title: GoHighLevel Automation (Workflow) Developer - Full Time, Work From Home
description:
We are hiring a full-time person to build automations (workflows) in GoHighLevel.



This is a permanent position; we're seeking someone who wants to stay with our company long term, work with our existing team (Philippinos & Australians), continue to learn & upgrade their skills to achieve mastery.





WHAT YOU'LL BE DOING:



* Build workflows in GoHighLevel to automate CRM and marketing activities for our clients

* Discuss business & automation requirements with clients and with your colleagues, then translate those requirements into funnel/workflow designs for implementation

* Plan and create other GoHighLevel assets required (e.g. custom fields, tags, forms) prior to building the workflows

* Set up database structures in GoHighLevel, using associations and custom objects, when necessary to meet business requirements

* Use 
 and also webhooks to integrate GoHighLevel with external applications when required

* Customise the user interface by adding small JavaScript code to forms and funnel pages when necessary



NOTE: this role does not require design skills and does not involve building funnel pages or web pages; we have web designers to do that work. This role involves only automation and related technical work.





LEARNING AND GROWTH OPPORTUNITIES WITH AI:



In this role you'll have the opportunity to learn more about AI, incorporate it into your work and move to the cutting edge of this exciting technology. Training will be provided.



If you have an interest in learning more about AI, this role will be especially attractive. Some ways that you can use AI at work include:



* Using AI platforms such as Claude and Gemini to write JavaScript code for UI customisation

* Building chatbots and voicebots for clients using GoHighLevel's native AI tools

* Testing & deploying GoHighLevel's new Workflow AI for automated building of workflows

* Integrate GoHighLevel with MCP servers to provide clients with a convenient chat interface to the CRM

* Deploy AI-powered add-on software tools that analyse data in the CRM, identify sales opportunites and at-risk clients, then recommend followup actions





REQUIREMENTS:



* At least 12 months of experience using GoHighLevel for workflows

* At least 2 years total experience with CRM automation and/or marketing automation, across GoHighLevel and competitive software such as Keap, Salesforce, Hubspot, ActiveCampaign etc

* A basic understanding of common digital marketing strategies, such as: lead magnet opt-ins, quiz funnels, webinars, social media comment funnels, product launches, etc

* Training and experience in software development will be an advantage

* An interest in AI and some experience building & testing with the technology will be an advantage





KEY PERSONAL QUALITIES:



1. Achievement-oriented

2. "Can do" attitude

3. Takes initiative and is efficient

4. Works well independently

5. High attention to detail

6. Consistently meets project deadlines



This is a full-time position, 40 hours per week. We pay the 13th month in December. We also provide time off in lieu if we need you to work outside your regular hours to meet a deadline. We will expect to be your only employment; we are not interested in people working for multiple clients or running side businesses.



We'd prefer that you work 8am - 4pm Phillippines time as this aligns with the business day here in Australia: 11am - 7pm Sydney time.





ABOUT US:



We are Clientflow, an Australian GoHighLevel agency focussed on providing SaaS software to white collar services businesses, such as mortgage brokers, real estate services businesses, surveyors, education & training companies, financial services businesses, etc.



We operate at a higher level of technical competence than most other GoHighLevel agencies. We've built a reputation for technical excellence and outstanding customer services that we will expect you to continue. Because of our reputation, clients trust us to build very sophisticated solutions in GoHighLevel for them. Few HighLevel agencies tackle implementation projects as complex as the ones we routinely complete.





APPLYING FOR THIS ROLE:



Please detail how well your experience matches the requirements above when applying. Include any references that you have from previous employers for similar work.



Please also provide one (1) relevant example of your work, such as an automation that you've built in a software platform like GoHighLevel, Make, Zapier or n8n. Record a short (max 5 minutes) video using 
, to walk us through your example and point out any ways that it is interesting, unique or was challenging to build.



DO NOT use an AI tool to write your application for this role. We want to hear from you in entirely your own words.



Feel free to also ask any questions that you have about the role and the work involved. We'll schedule a call on Zoom to discuss further.

title: Social Media Manager/ Editor (Reels/TikTok)
description:
## Role

Run a vlog-style Instagram account first, then gradually support business-related short videos.

You’ll handle day-to-day planning/editing/posting while we provide direction, references, and final approval.



## Core tasks

- Weekly content plan (simple calendar + hooks).

- Benchmark research: find strong reels, explain why they work, propose adaptations.

- Short-form editing (9:16): clean cuts, pacing, captions/subtitles, basic motion/zoom, audio leveling.

- Posting + light ops: upload, captions if needed, basic performance notes.





##Benchmark channels






(korean business)







## Screening questions (answer all).

You don’t need to have every skill for the questions below—if you don’t know something, that’s totally fine. But please answer honestly.





1) Portfolio (3–5 links): For each link, write what your role was(planning / editing / posting).



2) Editing tools + level: CapCut/Premiere/AE/etc. + your level (Beginner/Intermediate/Advanced) with portofolio



3) Editing workflow: Your step-by-step process when you receive raw clips. Do you use any additional tools? Can you edit the videos like reference videos?



4) Do you have experience with warming up accounts? If you have share me the accounts.



6) Virality knowledge: Have you studied how to make short videos go viral (hooks, retention, rewatch, shares)? Briefly explain + share 1 example analysis.



7) AI usage: Rate 0–10 and list what you use AI for (ideas, scripts, hooks, captions, subtitles, translation, etc.).



8) AI experience: Share 1 real example (what you generated + how you edited it before posting).



9) Automation tools: Have you used Claude Code, n8n, Zapier, or Make? If yes, what did you build (one sentence each).



10) K-pop familiarity: Rate 0–10 + 2–3 examples of K-pop-related content you edited/managed (links if possible).



11) Skin retouch editing: Have you done skin-tone correction / skin cleanup (beauty retouch)? Tools used + 1–2 examples (or exact steps).



12) Website (one sentence): Can you design and publish a simple landing page? If yes, what tools/stack?



13) if your face is later blurred or you wear a ski mask, are you open to film and appear in the videos?

title: DEVOPS / CLOUD ENGINEER
description:
Everstone Industries LLC is a fast-growing U.S. government contracting company focused on defense, aviation, and industrial supply.

We are building an internal automation platform to increase the number of government bids we can process daily by automating data ingestion, matching, and alerting.



We are looking for an experienced DevOps / Cloud Engineer to help us deploy, secure, and scale this system.



???? ROLE SUMMARY



You will be responsible for the cloud infrastructure, deployment, security, and reliability of a data-driven procurement automation platform.



This is a hands-on technical role, not a support role.



? RESPONSIBILITIES



Deploy and manage backend services (APIs, data pipelines)



Set up and maintain cloud infrastructure (AWS or GCP preferred)



Configure:



Compute (EC2 / Cloud Run / ECS)



Databases (PostgreSQL)



Storage (S3 or equivalent)



Implement CI/CD pipelines



Manage environment variables, secrets, and credentials securely



Set up logging, monitoring, and alerts



Ensure system uptime, backups, and basic disaster recovery



Assist with scaling as data volume and users increase



???? REQUIRED EXPERIENCE (NON-NEGOTIABLE)



You must have real-world experience with:



? AWS or Google Cloud Platform

? Linux server administration

? Docker / containerized deployments

? CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, etc.)

? Database deployment & maintenance (PostgreSQL)

? API security & access control

? Monitoring & logging tools



???? This role is NOT for entry-level engineers.



???? TECH STACK (CURRENT / PLANNED)



Backend: Python (FastAPI)



Database: PostgreSQL



Cloud: AWS or GCP



Containers: Docker



Task Queues: Celery / Redis



CI/CD: GitHub Actions



Infra as Code (bonus): Terraform



? BONUS SKILLS (STRONG PLUS)



Experience supporting data pipelines / ETL systems



Familiarity with scraping infrastructure



Prior work with GovTech, FinTech, or supply-chain platforms



Infrastructure-as-Code (Terraform)



Security best practices for SaaS platforms



???? WHY WORK WITH US



Long-term technical project (not one-off work)



Flexible hours



Clean, modern tech stack



Clear scope and decision-maker access



Opportunity to grow into a lead DevOps role as the system scales



???? HOW TO APPLY (IMPORTANT)



Please submit:



Your resume or LinkedIn profile



A short answer to this question:



“Describe a system you deployed in the cloud. What was the architecture, and what were you responsible for?”



Applications without this answer will not be reviewed.



???? SERIOUS ENGINEERS ONLY



We are building infrastructure that directly impacts revenue.

If you value clean deployments, reliability, and ownership, we want to work with you.

title: YouTube Production Coordinator (AI Operations)
description:
We are a high-volume media company running multiple YouTube channels. We are NOT looking for a creative writer. We are looking for an organized "Operator" to run our production line.



If you are a creative writer who wants to write your own stories, DO NOT APPLY.

If you are a highly organized Project Manager who loves AI tools, checklists, and hitting deadlines, this is for you.



YOUR ROLE:

You will be the "Engine" of our production. You will take ideas, turn them into assets using our AI tools, and manage our team of editors to ensure videos are finished on time.



SPECIFIC RESPONSIBILITIES:

1. AI Script Generation (Daily):

- You will take approved topics from our Trello board.

- You will use our specific "Prompt Guide" and Claude AI to generate scripts.

- You will compile the script sections into Google Docs. (No creative writing required, just precise execution of our system).



2. Voiceover Generation:

- You will use our TTS tool to generate voiceovers.

- You will check our 
 "Pinned Messages" to ensure you use the correct Voice ID and settings for each channel.

- You will audit the audio files to ensure no glitches before sending them to editors.



3. Production Management (Trello & 
):

- You will assign the Script and Voiceover to our Editors and Thumbnail Designers on Trello.

- You will ensure the Designer knows which script to follow for the thumbnail.

- You are responsible for the deadline. You must message editors on 
 daily. If they are late, you chase them.



4. Quality Control & Uploading:

- When an editor submits a video, you check it using our checklist.

- If it passes, you upload it to YouTube using our Templates.

- If it fails, you tag the editor for revisions.



REQUIREMENTS:

- EXTREMELY ORGANIZED: You will manage up to 6 channels. You must never lose a file or forget to tag a tea
mber.

- TECH SAVVY: You must be comfortable using Trello, 
, Google Drive, and learning new AI tools quickly.

- FAST INTERNET: You will be uploading large video files to YouTube. Slow internet will not work.

- HIGH AVAILABILITY: You need to be online during your shift to unblock editors if they have questions.



HOW TO APPLY (Strict Instructions):

We entirely ignore generic AI written applications. To be considered, you must follow these 3 steps exactly:



1. Record a 60-second LOOM video (screen recording) of your desktop.

- In the video, show me how you currently organize your files or your daily to-do list. I want to see that you are tidy and organized.

- Speak in the video so I can hear your microphone quality/English level.

2. In your loom video, you must show your internet speed test results from speedtest.net.

3. Make the Subject Line of your application: "YOUTUBE OPERATOR - [Your Favorite Color]"



If you do not include the Loom video or the specific subject line, your application will be archived immediately.

title: Bookkeeper for Amazon & Ecommerce Business
description:
We are a seasoned e-commerce business based in Canada, operating primarily in the U.S. on Amazon and Walmart. We specialize in home, kitchen, arts, and crafts products and have recently expanded into the dietary supplement space. With over seven years in the industry, we pride ourselves on delivering high-quality products directly to our customers.



We are looking for an experienced bookkeeper & accountant who can hit the ground running. The ideal candidate has prior experience handling accounting for an Amazon private label business or similar e-commerce companies. Familiarity with Amazon’s financial reports, cost structures, and reconciliation processes is highly preferred. While we can provide some training, candidates with direct experience in e-commerce accounting—especially on Amazon—will be given priority.



IMPORTANT: Only applications submitted through the link at the bottom will be considered.



Position Details:

Job Type: Part-time

Hours: 15 - 20 hours per month (subject to change based on workload)

Location: Remote

Hourly Pay: $7 - $10 USD (depending on experience)



Key Responsibilities:

1. Reconcile transactions from multiple bank accounts, credit cards, and PayPal in Xero.

2. Maintain accurate financial records using Xero accounting software.

3. Prepare monthly financial reports and statements.

4. Work with Excel and Google Sheets for financial data analysis and reporting.

5. Collaborate with the team to ensure smooth financial operations and resolve discrepancies.

6. Maintain a cost of goods sold (COGS) tracking sheet for each product.

7. Calculate monthly margins for products based on COGS and various Amazon reports.



Requirements:

1. Strong preference for candidates with experience in accounting for an Amazon private label business or e-commerce company.

2. Solid understanding of accounting principles.

3. Proficiency in Xero (mandatory).

4. Strong Excel and Google Sheets skills.

5. Familiarity with Amazon’s financial reporting, transaction structures, and cost tracking is highly preferred.

6. Familiarity with Power BI or Google Data Studio is a plus but not required.



What We Offer:

- Flexible working hours – as long as work is completed in a timely manner.

- Opportunity to grow with a thriving e-commerce business.

- Competitive compensation.

- Supportive and collaborative team environment.



If you have experience managing financials for an Amazon business and are looking for a flexible, part-time role, we’d love to hear from you!



LINK TO APPLICATION: 



IMPORTANT: ONLY APPLICATIONS SUBMITTED THROUGH THE LINK ABOVE WILL BE CONSIDERED. ALSO, NOTE WE USE AI DETECTORS FOR RESPONSES TO QUESTIONS, SO IF AI GENERATED ANSWERS ARE IDENTIFIED THE APPLICATION WILL NOT BE CONSIDERED.

title: Graphic Designer
description:
About Us:

We’re MediaVosa – a creative media company pushing boundaries in everything we do, from video production to social media management and graphic design. We’re launching real soon and looking to hire in advance. If you’re excited to be part of a growing team that values creativity, fun, and pushing the limits of design, we want you to join us as a Graphic Designer.



What We’re Looking For:

We’re after a mid-level to senior Graphic Designer with a passion for creating logos, social media assets, and everything in between. You should be experienced with Illustrator and have a deep understanding of creating vector-based designs that align with our brand. If you’re someone who thrives on creative freedom while sticking to design guidelines, we’re looking for you!



Your Responsibilities:

• Create logos, branding assets, and social media visuals: Design logos and branding materials that align with brands identity and stand out in social media feeds. Expect to create vector-based logos, icons, and typography that resonate with the audience.

• Produce sharp, modern designs: Using Adobe Illustrator, you'll be expected to create clean, scalable designs (logos, banners, ads) while ensuring high-quality resolution and consistency across all platforms.

• Social media assets: Create eye-catching assets such as Instagram posts, Reels covers, TikTok thumbnails, LinkedIn banners, and
 ads. This includes ensuring designs are optimised for each platform’s specific dimensions and style.

• Design banners, templates, and other digital assets: You’ll design and modify templates for social media and marketing materials, working quickly while maintaining a high level of quality. This includes being able to work with text overlays, photos, textures, and shapes.

• Work with stock imagery: You must be able to use Photoshop to manipulate and enhance stock photos, from removing backgrounds to colour corrections, ensuring everything fits seamlessly with the brand.

• Keep up with design trends: You should be able to spot emerging design trends in the digital space and apply those trends in a way that elevates the brand.



Skills & Qualifications:

• Mid-level to senior experience with Adobe Illustrator (and Photoshop is a plus).

• Strong experience in vector-based design (logos, branding, social media assets).

• Proficient in Photoshop, with the ability to remove backgrounds, adjust colours, and enhance photos to fit the brand’s look and feel.

• Deep understanding of brand identity and how to create designs that resonate with audiences.

• A keen eye for detail, composition, and design aesthetics.

• Experience in social media design, understanding how to design for platforms like Instagram, TikTok, and LinkedIn.



Why Work With Us?

• Join a growing media company with global aspirations.

• Work on exciting projects with plenty of creative freedom.

• Be part of a young, innovative team that values creativity.

• Flexibility, growth opportunities, and the chance to define our visual brand identity.



How to Apply:

1. Send over your portfolio showcasing your best work.

2. Include examples of logos, branding, and social media designs you've created.

3. Show us your creativity—we want to see what you can bring to the table!

Viral Collab is a leading influencer marketing agency representing 100+ content creators across gaming, tech, and entertainment. We help top creators grow their brands and connect them with some of the world’s biggest companies.

We’re looking for a part-time Influencer Outreach Assistant to help us grow our talent roster. If you're plugged into social media, know how to spot rising creators, and enjoy crafting smart outreach
s—this role is for you.



Responsibilities

Use provided tools to discover relevant content creators on platforms like YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, and Twitch.



Create curated lists of potential talents based on specific categories and criteria.



Craft personalized outreach
s and send them to creators on behalf of Viral Collab.



Schedule meetings between interested creators and our Talent Acquisition Lead.



Maintain accurate tracking of outreach and responses using our internal system.



Requirements

Strong interest in influencer marketing, gaming, and/or digital media.



Great communication and written skills 
 experience is a plus).



Detail-oriented and organized—able to manage lists and schedules efficiently.



Self-motivated and reliable, able to work independently with minimal supervision.



Familiarity with platforms like YouTube, TikTok, Twitch, and Instagram.

title: Business Development Representative
description:
About Us:

Viral Collab is an influencer marketing agency representing top creators across gaming, tech, and entertainment. We connect brands with creators to build impactful, authentic campaigns that reach millions of engaged fans.



We’re seeking a strategic and resourceful Outreach Sales Specialist to join our team. This is a part-time role with the opportunity to transition into a full-time position based on performance.



Role Overview:

Your primary objective will be to generate genuine interest from brands in collaborating with our creators. Rather than simply booking meetings, your focus will be on identifying where a specific creator or campaign concept aligns with a brand’s goals, initiating that conversation, and introducing qualified leads to our sales team. The outcome of your work is either a warm introduction for a continued discussion or a scheduled meeting with our team to explore collaboration opportunities in more depth.



Key Responsibilities:



Research and identify potential clients, brands, and decision-makers in the gaming, tech, and entertainment industries.



Strategically match creators from our roster with relevant brands or campaigns based on audience, content style, and brand objectives.



Initiate contact with decision-makers and clearly communicate the value of potential collaborations.



Generate and qualify real interest from brands and seamlessly hand off opportunities to the sales team for next steps.



Track outreach activity, responses, and interest level accurately in our CRM.



Collaborate closely with the sales team to shape partnership proposals and support deal flow.



Requirements:



Proven experience in outreach, business development, or influencer marketing sales.



Strong knowledge of the gaming and tech industries is a must. Familiarity with key players, trends, audiences, and brand dynamics is essential for success in this role.



Strategic thinking with the ability to connect the dots between a creator’s brand and a company’s objectives.



Excellent communication skills and the confidence to engage with executives and decision-makers.



Highly organized, persistent, and motivated by performance targets.



What We Offer:



Hourly compensation with the potential for increased hours and responsibilities as performance grows.



A clear pathway into a full-time role.



The chance to work with leading creators and high-profile brands in gaming, tech, and entertainment.



Flexible, remote work environment.

title: Senior Graphic Designer
description:
About the Role

We’re looking for a Senior Graphic Designer to lead and elevate our social design function. This role sits at the intersection of creative leadership, design execution, and social strategy. You’ll oversee our social designers, partner closely with the Social and Creative teams, and ensure every brand we touch shows up visually strong, consistent, and platform-native across Instagram, TikTok, and beyond.



This is a hands-on leadership role. You’ll still design, but you’ll also set the standard — guiding designers, shaping wxorkflows, reviewing work, and ensuring our social content feels thoughtful, elevated, and performance-minded.



You’ll collaborate closely with our Director of Social and Creative Strategist to translate brand direction into scalable social systems, campaign visuals, and high-performing content — while maintaining a sharp, modern aesthetic across all client accounts.



***Please DO NOT forget to fill up this form: 
 

***Applications via Message will not be counted. 



Key Responsibilities

1. Creative Leadership & Team Oversight

Lead and oversee the social design team, setting visual standards, reviewing work, and providing clear creative direction and feedback

Act as the primary design lead for social across assigned clients, ensuring consistency, quality, and brand alignment

Support junior designers’ growth through mentorship, reviews, and best-practice guidance

Help build and refine scalable design systems, templates, and workflows for social execution



2. Social Design & Visual Direction

Design high-performing, brand-aligned assets including static graphics, reels covers, carousels, story templates, and social-first visuals

Maintain and evolve brand aesthetics across platforms, balancing creativity with performance

Ensure all social content is optimized for platform best practices (TikTok vs. Instagram nuances, cover-first thinking, etc.)

Partner with social managers to support monthly content needs and campaign 
nts



3. Content Planning & Collaboration

Collaborate with Social Managers to support monthly content calendars from a design perspective

Work cross-functionally with influencer, paid media, and production teams to ensure design supports campaign goals

Help translate larger brand campaigns into modular, social-native visual assets



4. Client Support & Creative Execution

Participate in client reviews and approvals as needed, confidently speaking to design decisions and creative rationale

Support leadership with creative input for strategy decks, presentations, and visual storytelling

Ensure timelines, deliverables, and quality standards are met across all assigned accounts



5. Innovation & Tools

Explore and implement AI-assisted tools (Canva AI, ChatGPT, etc.) to improve design efficiency and output

Proactively bring new ideas for formats, templates, and creative experiments that improve both performance and workflow



What We’re Looking For

- 5+ years of experience in graphic design, with a strong focus on social-first content (agency experience a plus)

- Proven experience overseeing or mentoring designers, or acting as a creative lead

- Deep understanding of social platforms and what performs visually across Instagram, TikTok, Pinterest, and emerging channels

- Strong proficiency in Canva and Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator; After Effects a plus)

- Solid understanding of lo-fi video and social editing tools (CapCut, InShot, etc.)

- Exceptional eye for aesthetics, layout, typography, and visual storytelling

- Highly organized, proactive, and comfortable managing multiple brands and deadlines

- Confident collaborator who communicates clearly with internal teams and clients

title: Data Entry
description:
Company Overview: Terrific Property Group

Terrific Property Group is a real estate investment firm specializing in the "wholesale" model of property acquisition. As defined in authoritative real estate literature, wholesaling involves identifying distressed properties, securing them under contract, and assigning those contracts to end-investors for an assignment fee. Our mission is to provide liquidity to homeowners in difficult situations while revitalizing local housing markets through strategic investment.

Position: Cold Caller & Data Entry Specialist

We are seeking a dedicated professional to join our acquisitions team. This role is fundamental to the "prospecting" phase of the real estate cycle, which requires consistent outreach to generate a steady "deal flow.The successful candidate will bridge the gap between raw data and actionable investment opportunities.

Primary Responsibilities

 • Outbound Prospecting: Conduct high-volume cold calling to property owners using provided lead lists. You will utilize "scripts" designed to build rapport and identify "motivated sellers"—those whose circumstances (such as probate, foreclosure, or property distress) necessitate a quick sale.

 • Lead Qualification: Assess the four pillars of a wholesale lead: Motivation, Timeline, Property Condition, and Price Expectation.

 • Data Management: Accurately input property details and owner information into our Customer Relationship Management (CRM) system.This includes updating "disposition" statuses to ensure the sales funnel remains organized.

 • Information Security: Maintain strict confidentiality regarding the financial and personal data of potential sellers, adhering to standard ethical practices in real estate brokerage and investment.

Qualifications and Requirements

 • Communication Skills: Proficiency in English with the ability to handle objections gracefully. In real estate, the "art of the deal" often begins with the ability to listen and empathize with the seller's unique situation.

 • Technical Proficiency: Experience with VOIP systems and data entry software. Candidates must have a reliable computer (Windows OS preferred) and a stable internet connection.

 • Resilience: The ability to maintain a high level of energy and professionalism throughout a shift, as cold calling is a numbers-driven activity where "conversion rates" are optimized through persistence.

Compensation and Schedule

 • Rate: 175 php per hour.

 • Payment Structure: As an Independent Contractor, you are responsible for your own local taxes and benefits.

 • Performance Incentives: Potential for bonuses based on the successful closing of deals generated from your leads.



Please reply with
 contact and WhatsApp phone number

title: Content, Writer & Operations Associate (Investing)
description:

We are looking for a highly competent, intellectually capable Content & Operations Associate to support our editorial and day-to-day operations. title: Account / Client Success Manager
description:
About the Role



We're a performance marketing agency that generates leads and booked appointments for medical spas across the US. We manage ~30 client accounts with a combined monthly ad spend of $45,000+. We're scaling to $150K/month revenue and need someone who owns client outcomes, not just client communication.



This is not a customer support role. You're not here to be nice to clients. You're here to make sure they get results, keep them retained, grow their ad spend, and hold the internal team accountable when things slip.



You'll report directly to the founder and manage all 30 accounts (with a structured onboarding ramp). If you perform, you'll grow into a Client Success Lead role overseeing a small team.



What You Own



Client retention. If a client churns and you didn't see it coming or act to prevent it, that's on you.

Proactive communication. Clients should never have to chase you for updates. You reach out before they do.

Internal coordination. You work with our media buyer and call center manager to ensure CPL, cost-per-appointment, and booking rates stay on track. If something's slipping, you escalate or fix it—don't wait to be told.

Client expectations. Some clients are unreasonable. You push back with data, not apologies. You set realistic expectations and hold the line.

Growth. Happy clients with good results should increase their ad spend. You identify opportunities and make the case.

Reporting. Weekly client updates with clear metrics: leads generated, appointments booked, CPL, cost-per-appointment, and what's being done to improve.



Your KPIs (measured from month 2)



Monthly client churn: < 10%

Client response time: < 4 hours during business hours

Weekly reports sent on time: 100? spend growth (upsells): Net positive month-over-month

Internal escalation turnaround: < 24 hours to resolution or action plan



What You Need



Non-negotiable:



2+ years in a client-facing role at a marketing or lead generation agency (not general VA work)

Experience managing multiple accounts simultaneously (10+)

You understand performance marketing metrics: CPL, CPA, cost-per-appointment, ROAS, booking rates

Strong written and spoken English—clients are US-based business owners

Available during US business hours (EST preferred, PST acceptable)

Comfortable with conflict. You can tell a client "no" and tell your team "fix this by tomorrow"



Strong advantage:



Experience in medspa, aesthetics, dental, or healthcare marketing

Familiarity with GoHighLevel (GHL)

Experience working with call centers or appointment-setting teams

You've managed churn reduction or client retention programs before



Compensation



$3,000/month base salary depending on experience

Performance commission tied to retention and ad spend growth ($6k-$8k OTE)

Clear promotion path: Account Manager / Client Success Lead / Ops Manager based on hitting KPIs

Remote, flexible environment with a lean, high-autonomy team



Growth Path

This isn't a dead-end role. Here's what "Client Success Lead" looks like:



You manage a small team of 1–2 junior account managers

You own the retention strategy across all accounts

You have authority to make decisions on client issues without founder approval

Base salary increases to $4,000–$5,000/month + higher commission tier

Timeline: 6–12 months if you consistently hit KPIs



This Role Isn't For You If



You need to be told what to do every day

You avoid difficult conversations with clients or teammates

You think your job is done once you send an update

You've only done general virtual assistant work and want to "try" account management

You take client complaints personally instead of solving them systematically



How to Apply



A 2–3 minute video introducing yourself (Loom or similar). Tell us about your most difficult client situation and how you handled it.

Your resume highlighting agency or client management experience specifically.

Answer this question in your application: "A client's CPL jumped 40% this week and they're threatening to cancel. What do you do in the first 24 hours?"



Applications without a video and without answering the scenario question will not be reviewed.
